programme.title: Amores Perros
programme.desc: Kauhea auto-onnettomuus yhdistaa kolme tarinaa, joista jokaisessa on mukana hahmoja, jotka kasittelevat menetysta, katumusta ja elaman ankaraa todellisuutta, kaikki rakkauden nimissa.

programme.title: Before Dawn
programme.desc: Nuori mies jattaa perheensa lammastilan taakseen Australian takamailla ja liittyy maanmiestensa joukkoon lansirintamalle ensimmaiseen maailmansotaan. Heidan tavoitteenaan on nopeuttaa verisen konfliktin paattymista. Mutta sodan raivotessa miehen taytyy selvita juoksuhautojen ankarassa todellisuudessa ja taistelun valittomassa vaarassa pysyakseen hengissa – ja jattamatta ketaan taakseen.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Arkkitehti Leo Watersin avioliitto saroilee. Hanen vaimonsa Julia ei ole onnellinen, ja heidan poikansa Martin jattaa opiskelut kesken ja palaa kotiinsa eksyneena, eika oikein onnistu loytamaan yhteista savelta Leon kanssa. Christinatyttarella on murrosika kaynnissa kaikkine vartalossa ja tunteissa tapahtuvine muutoksineen. Kuvaan astuu Tonya Neely, poliittinen aktivisti joka asuu Leon monta vuotta sitten suunnittelemassa kerrostalossa.

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: Albert Nobbs
programme.desc: Albert Nobbs kertoo koskettavan tarinan 1800-luvun lopun Irlannissa, missa koyhan naisen elama on mahdotonta ilman elattajaa. Vuosikaudet Albert Nobbs on selvinnyt pukeutumalla mieheksi voidakseen tyoskennella hovimestarina Dublinin ylaluokan hotellissa. Tavatessaan hotelliin saapuvan komean maalarin, Albert havaitsee etta elama voi tarjota mahdollisuuksia myos hanen kaltaiselleen.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: The Honor List
programme.desc: Kolme entista bestista tapaavat jalleen, kun ryhman neljas jasen kuolee yllattaen high schoolin viimeisella luokalla. He paattavat suorittaa veivilistan, jonka he tekivat fuksivuonna ollessaan viela laheisia.

programme.title: Dont Come Knocking
programme.desc: Hollywood-tahti Howard Spence (Sam Shepard) on nahnyt parempiakin paivia, mutta nyt han ratsastaa vain menneella maineellaan. Jalleen yhden irstailuillan jalkeen han pakenee uuden lankkarin kuvauksista ja ratsastaa preerialle kuin yksi sankareista, joita han on niin usein naytellyt. Han etsii suojaa aitinsa (Eva Marie Saint) luota, jota han ei ole nahnyt vuosiin. Tosin siellakaan han ei viivy kauan saatuaan tietaa, etta hanella saattaa olla poika, josta han ei ole tiennyt. Howardille tama tuo toivoa siita, ettei hanen elamansa ole ollutkaan taysin turhaa. Ehka jossain on paikka, jonne han kuuluu.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Intensiivisessa draamassa seurataan kahta high school -opiskelijaa, Hancockia ja Dannya, heidan valmistumisensa jalkeen. Hancock tyytyy cheerleader-tyttoystavansa kanssa keskiluokkaiseen keskinkertaisuuteen ja etaantyy Dannysta ja taman psykoottisesta vaimosta, Bevista.

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: Winged Creatures
programme.desc: Tavallinen paiva tavallisessa ravintolassa Los Angelesissa. Rauha rikkoutuu silmanrapayksessa, kun psykopaatti astelee sisaan ravintolaan, ottaa aseen esiin ja alkaa ampua eparoimatta ympariinsa. Osa ihmisista kuolee. Henkiinjaaneet yrittavat ymmartaa mita on tapahtunut, ja miten elamalle saa taas uuden merkityksen ja turvallisuuden tunteen.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: Vuonna 1944, tuhansittain Ita-Euroopan juutalaisia kuolee joukkoteurastuksissa. Vaimonsa kuoleman jalkeen toimimaan havahtunut unkarilainen asianajaja Sonson paatyy johtamaan vastarintaliikkeen aatteellista taistelua kasvavan epatoivon vallassa toimivaa, vaarallista natsiarmeijaa vastaan. Yhdistamalla uskalluksen ja uhkarohkeuden hapeilemattomyyteen, Sonson kaantaa silkan selviytymistaistelun joksikin paljon merkittavammaksi – keinoksi kostaa omiensa kuolema pelastamalla tuhansia muita.

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: April on lukioikainen tytto, jonka arkea rytmittaa koulun lisaksi jalkapallotreenit ja kavereiden jarjestamat bileet. Varautuneen ja hiljaisen ulkokuoren alle katkeytyy haaveilijasielu, jonka aani ei aina kantaudu hottoisan aidin tai eksentrisen isapuolen korviin. Romanssin ontuessa lukiokaveri Teddyyn kipina tuntuu kuitenkin loytyvan Aprilin ja taman jalkapallovalmentajan yhteisista hetkista.
Nuoren kirjailijan on hyvaksyttava kuolevaisuutensa kun hanella todetaan harvinainen syopa.Parhaan ystavansa ja empaattisen nuoren terapeutin avulla han loytaa rohkeuden taistella sairautta vastaan.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen nayttelee tassa kriitikoiden ylistamassa tarinassa hapaistysta toimittajasta, jonka on ohjannut ja kirjoittanut Billy Ray, CAPTAIN PHILLIPSISTÄ Oscar-ehdokkuuden saanut kirjoittaja. Kun kuuluisa toimittaja Stephen Glass (Christensen) joutuuu Forbes.com toimittajan (Steve Zahn) tutkinnan alle, paljastuu etta Glass on keksinyt monet hanen tunnetuimmista tarinoista, joka johtaa hanen tuhoonsa tassa mukaansatempaavassa, tositarinassa.

programme.title: Equals
programme.desc: Utopistisessa maailmassa, missa vakivalta ja rikollisuus on kitketty poistamalla ihmisten tunteet geneettisesti, eletaan Nian ja Silasin tavoin rauhallista ja yksitoikkoista elamaa. Tyopaikallaan tiedotusmateriaalien tuotantolaitoksessa he vaihtavat tyotoverien kesken ainoastaan kohteliaisuuksia. Elama on yksinkertaista kunnes huhu tartunnasta, jonka seurauksena ihminen nayttaa tunteensa, leviaa. Sairastuneet lahetetaan pois, eika heita nahda enaa koskaan. Silas epailee kantavansa tartuntaa, ja asian vahvistuttua hanesta tulee hylkio. Silti han tuntee vetoa Niaan, joka on myos saanut tartunnan, mutta onnistuu salaamaan oireensa.

programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire
programme.desc: Tositarina irlantilaisesta havittajalentaja Brendan ”Paddy” Finucanesta, josta vain 21-vuotiaana tuli Royal Air Forcen nuorin laivueenkomentaja ja yksi toisen maailmansodan suurimmista ja palkituimmista havittaja-assista.

programme.title: The Honor List
programme.desc: Kolme entista bestista tapaavat jalleen, kun ryhman neljas jasen kuolee yllattaen high schoolin viimeisella luokalla. He paattavat suorittaa veivilistan, jonka he tekivat fuksivuonna ollessaan viela laheisia.

programme.title: Jimmy P.
programme.desc: Huolestunut Amerikan alkuperaisasukas muodostaa poikkeuksellisen ystavyyden ranskalaisen psykoanalyytikon kanssa, kun he yrittavat loytaa parannuskeinon karsimykselleen.

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Arkkitehti Leo Watersin avioliitto saroilee. Hanen vaimonsa Julia ei ole onnellinen, ja heidan poikansa Martin jattaa opiskelut kesken ja palaa kotiinsa eksyneena, eika oikein onnistu loytamaan yhteista savelta Leon kanssa. Christinatyttarella on murrosika kaynnissa kaikkine vartalossa ja tunteissa tapahtuvine muutoksineen. Kuvaan astuu Tonya Neely, poliittinen aktivisti joka asuu Leon monta vuotta sitten suunnittelemassa kerrostalossa.

programme.title: Synchronicity
programme.desc: "Fyysikko Jim Beale on keksinyt aikakoneen, joka mullistaa maailman. Kun vaikutusvaltainen pohatta Klaus Meisner kuulee keksinnosta, han paattaa omia koneen hinnalla milla hyvansa. Jotta keksinto ei joutuisi vaariin kasiin, Jim paattaa matkustaa ajassa taaksepain muuttaakseen asioita. Sundancen elokuvajuhlien lempilapsen Jacob Gentryn elokuva, Synchronicity, on aivonystyroita kutkuttava ‘Scifi Noir’, joka kulkee Blade Runnerin, Gattacan ja Mementon jalanjaljissa."

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: Kapteeni Sam Cahill (Maguire) on lahdossa neljannelle komennukselleen, jattaen jalkeensa rakkaan vaimonsa (Portman) ja kaksi tytartaan. Kun Samin Black Hawk –helikopteri ammutaan alas Afganistanin vuoristossa, pahimman oletetaan tapahtuneen, ja perheeseen jaa valtava aukko. Synkasta historiastaan huolimatta Samin karismaattinen pikkuveli Tommy (Gyllenhaal)

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: Kolme miesta saapuu autiolle saarelle Skotlannin edustalla vartioimaan majakkaa. Eraana paivana vedenrajasta loytyy tiedoton mies vieressaan suuri arkullinen kultaa.., Tasta seuraa vainoharhoista, eristyksesta ja ahneudesta syntyva eloonjaamistaistelu. Gerard Butler (300, Angel Has Fallen) loistaa roolissaan rehellisena perheenisana, jonka mystiset olosuhteet pakottavat aarirajoilleen. Elokuvan on ohjannut tanskalainen Kristoffer Nyholm (Taboo, Rikos) ja myos tanskalainen Søren Malling (Pinnan alla, Sota) nahdaan ratkaisevassa sivuroolissa. Elokuva pohjaa tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Camp X-Ray kertoo nuoresta naisesta, joka liittyy Yhdysvaltain armeijaan ollakseen osa jotain itseaan ja pikkukaupunkinsa juuria suurempaa. Han paatyy kuitenkin vartijaksi Guantanamo Bayhin, missa han solmii ystavyyssuhteen yhden vangin kanssa. Eettisia kysymyksia pohtiessaan naiden kahden eri lahtokohdista tulleen ihmisen ystavyys muuttaa heidan molempien elaman.

programme.title: From Time to Time
programme.desc: Kummittava aavetarina, joka kattaa kaksi maailmaa, yli vuosisadan erolla. Kun 13-vuotias Tolly saa selville, etta han voi salaperaisesti matkustaa naiden kahden valilla, han aloittaa seikkailun, joka paljastaa sukupolvien ajan haudatut perheen salaisuudet.

programme.title: Drive-In Revivin
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture.

programme.title: Children of the Cornbread
programme.desc: When the Robertson brothers debate which of their wives makes the best cornbread, it escalates into a full-on cornbread cook off.

programme.title: Whole Lotta Bull
programme.desc: The guys enjoy a one-day rodeo fantasy camp where they learn.

programme.title: Here Comes the Son
programme.desc: After leaving school to pursue music, Jase feels that Reed needs some structure.

programme.title: Brod Trip
programme.desc: Jase accompanies Willie on a business trip to Arkansas to pitch a new product.

programme.title: Techs and Balances
programme.desc: Willie thinks his kids have been spending too much time on their phones.

programme.title: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood.

programme.title: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office.

programme.title: Razing the Snakes
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of snakes.

programme.title: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires.

programme.title: Good Willie Hunting
programme.desc: Willie and Jase debate over tracking ability which leads to a challenge.

programme.title: Sleep Cover
programme.desc: Willie and Jep must step in and supervise Bellas sleepover.

programme.title: Drive-In Revivin

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 36 SuperFight Series is headlined by Congolese-German light heavyweight Danyo Ilunga throwing down with the Netherlands Michael Duut. Armenian-Belgian power puncher Harut Grigorian battles 23-year-old German prospect Danijel Solaja at welterweight in the cant miss co-headline bout. Plus two Super Bantamweight Grand Prix bouts. Muay Thai champion and MMA star Tiffany van Soest meets Canadian challenger Jessica Gladstone in one semifinal match-up, while 21-year-old Dutch prospect Isis Verbeek takes on undefeated Amel Dehby of France. The winners of each semifinal match-up will advance to the Grand Prix tournament final – the opening bout of GLORY: COLLISION.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A four-man one-night heavyweight tournament will take centre stage with the winner punching his ticket into the historic end of year GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix for a chance to win a life-changing $500,000. The four participants are Dutch giant Martin Terpstra (21-5, 11 KO), former light heavyweight title contender Mohamed Amine (29-5, 16 KO), the explosive Bahram Rajabzadeh (62-1, 56 KO), and the bruising power puncher Uku Jurjendal (18-7, 14 KO). A huge international title fight will feature in the co-main event as Tyjani Beztati (24-4, 9 KO) will put his GLORY lightweight championship on the line against Japanese star Kaito Ono (51-6-1, 22 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The GLORY 33 SuperFight Series features a middleweight title fight between champion SImon Marcus and top ranked challenger Jason Wilnis. Plus a heavyweight battle between Chi Lewis Parry and Anthony McDonald.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The King of Kickboxing Rico Verhoeven puts his heavyweight belt on the line as he faces off against Brazilian Anderson Silva. Also, a one night, four-man featherweight tournament featuring former champion Serhii Adamchuk.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E88 K1 WGP 2008 Yokohama - Finals
programme.desc: The top 8 Heavyweight kickboxers in the world compete in a 1 day tournament to see who will be crowned World Grand Prix Champion.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Zack Mwekassa takes on Zinedine Hameur-Lain in the main event of the GLORY 29 Superfight Series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: This event featured world title fight for the Glory Welterweight Championship between Nieky Holzken and Yoann Kongolo as headliner, and 4-Man Heavyweight Contender Tournament to earn a title shot for the Glory Heavyweight Championship.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY returns to Europe as current lightweight champion Robin van Roosmalen puts his title on the line in a rematch against Sittichai Sitsongpeenong. Plus, a four-man welterweight tournament featuring Murthel Groenhart, Yoann Kongolo, Harut Grigorian, and Karim Benmansour.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: In the main event, featherweight champ Petch (168-39-3, 27 KO) looks to defend his crown for the sixth time when he welcomes the challenge of local hero Ahmad Chikh Mousa (58-8-1, 28 KO). The co-main event will see a crucial fight between Romania’s Benjamin Adegbuyi (35-8, 20 KO) and Sofian Laïdouni (35-2-1, 17 KO) of France that will decide who will qualify for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix in December.

programme.title: The Gay Amigo
programme.desc: Mistaken for bandits, Cisco and Pancho are captured by the Captain, who releases them to track the real gang. Cisco discovers the true leaders are the editor and blacksmith. Using cunning, he sows distrust between them, gains the blacksmith’s trust, and joins the gang, setting up a trap to bring the criminals to justice.

programme.title: Boot Hill Bandits
programme.desc: Shady town businessman Bolton seems to be the leader of the gang but even he takes his order from a higher authority who may have tried to take Marshal Corrigans life.

programme.title: The Return of Jack Slade
programme.desc: Jack Slade, son of a legendary lawman, infiltrates a ruthless gang of outlaws to bring them down from within. After his friend is killed, Slade sets a deadly trap with the help of a Pinkerton agent. Deception, betrayal, and revenge ride hard in this classic Western showdown.

programme.title: Yellow Hair and the Fortress of Gold
programme.desc: Fiery blonde half-breed Yellow Hair and her easygoing sidekick the Pecos Kid are after a fortune in Mayan gold.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 28, 29, 30
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Watch Out Gringo! Sabata Will Return
programme.desc: A gang of bandits, led by the infamous Luke Morgan, hijacks a stagecoach carrying an army gold strongbox and takes a hostage. But when Carrancho steals the gold from them, hiding it in a grave, the chase intensifies. Both sides race to recover the treasure, with lives at stake and a relentless pursuit in the wild.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP29-32
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP33-35
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Wells Fargo hires pistoleros to protect against increasing banditry. Jeff Sullivan, driven by revenge for the brutal murder of his wife by Glenn Kovacks and his gang, joins the effort. Sullivan partners with Pancho Corrales and pursues Kovacks, using Kovacks stepbrother, Dan, as leverage. Their final confrontation leads to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: Yellowneck
programme.desc: A disgraced Confederate colonel deserts and escapes into the Everglades, joining four other Southern deserters. Surrounded by hostile Seminoles, the group must navigate the treacherous swamp while confronting both nature and their inner demons in a tense fight for survival.

programme.title: Deadly Trackers
programme.desc: Jeff sets out to murder each one of the five outlaws who robbed, raped and killed his poor sister.

programme.title: Buddy Goes West
programme.desc: Two outlaws, "The Doctor" and the Indian Girolamo, help a village fight a gang and a corrupt sheriff who has discovered gold beneath the town.

programme.title: My Name is Pecos
programme.desc: Everyone wants to know who the Mexican is. He always answer slowly, "my name is Pecos". Pecos Martinez to be exact, and hes returned to his hometown of Houston to settle up with Clain, the leader of a gang of cut-throats. Clain is busy looking for the money from a recent robbery thats been stolen from him. Soon the stolen cash in Pecos vengeance entwine and all hell breaks loose. Behind the scenes a Bible touting Undertaker (Umberto Raho), a cowardly saloon owner, and a helpful saloon girl become part of the story. This film made Woods as internationally known as Pecos in the third world countries as Franco Nero was known for Django. A Mexican hero against a gang and a town full of...

programme.title: Incredible Rocky Mountain Race
programme.desc: An old man observes a boy bullying his playmates and treats him to a morality lesson. The man tells the story of the epic cross-country race between a young Mark Twain and his rival, Mike Fink.

programme.title: White Fang and the Gold Diggers
programme.desc: Sandy Shaw inherits the "Eagles Nest" gold mine in Canadas wild north. With his son Rick and dog Whiskey, he faces Taft, a ruthless rival eager to claim the mine. When Sandy’s proxy bride arrives, the clash of greed, revenge, and betrayal turns deadly in this fight for survival.

programme.title: Running Target
programme.desc: In the Colorado Rockies, Sheriff Scott, heads a posse that is after four escaped convicts, and thought it is his sworn duty to return the men dead or alive, he is, as always, reluctant to kill his fellow man.

programme.title: Buckskin Frontier
programme.desc: A railroad man and the owner of a freight line battle for control of a crucial mountain pass.

programme.title: Gentleman Killer
programme.desc: A quiet border town erupts into chaos as tensions rise between the US and Mexico. The cause? A ruthless Mexican bandit determined to kill as many US soldiers as possible. As political turmoil intensifies, the town becomes the center of a deadly conflict, where vengeance, power, and survival collide.

programme.title: The Girl from San Lorenzo
programme.desc: Two outlaws posing as Cisco and Pancho are wreaking havoc. When the real Cisco and Pancho are captured, the criminals plan a final heist, using the duo as alibis. After breaking them out of jail, the real heroes have a chance to escape and clear their names by capturing the imposters. Will they succeed or be caught again?

programme.title: Apache Rose
programme.desc: Old Western Movie from 1947 starring Roy Rogers directed by William Witney: Apache Rose - Roy is an oil prospector. His efforts to get drilling rights on an old Spanish land grant are countered by gamblers from an off-shore gambling boat determined to control the land (and oil) themselves.

programme.title: Against a Crooked Sky
programme.desc: The eldest daughter of a pioneer family is kidnapped by a mysterious Indian tribe and the eldest son pursues. In order to win back his sisters freedom, he must sacrifice his own life by passing the test of "Crooked Sky" and shield his sister from an executioners arrow. Along the way, he recruits a broken down, drunk prospector to help him track down the unknown tribe and rescue his sister.

programme.title: Silent Thunder
programme.desc: With the help of two bank robbers, a US Marshal sets out to rescue five prostitutes who have been abducted by a gang of desert dwelling, otherworldly, monsters

programme.title: War Paint
programme.desc: Lieut. Billings and his patrol must deliver a peace treaty to Chief Gray Cloud in nine days to prevent war. Guided by the chief’s son, Taslik, they face dwindling water and rising tensions. As suspicions grow, they notice Taslik wearing war paint. Is he leading them to peace or into a trap?

programme.title: The Over-the-Hill Gang Rides Again
programme.desc: Retired Texas Ranger Nash Crawford re-assembles his former Ranger outfit from the old days to fight crime in his hometown.

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

programme.title: Murieta!
programme.desc: The story of Joaquin Murrieta, a real life Mexican bandit who terrorized California with his gang of raiders and cutthroats during the first half of the 19th century. Some saw him as a murderous outlaw, others as the Mexican Robin Hood.

programme.title: The Tall Texan
programme.desc: Five travelers - a tinhorn and his lover, a sheriff with a prisoner, and a sea captain with a murky past—cross Comanche country. When a renegade Indian reveals a hidden gold field to repay their kindness, greed takes over, sparking tension and dangerous decisions as the group’s true motives are laid bare.

programme.title: Bandidos
programme.desc: Renowned gunman Richard Martin is traveling on a train, held up by Billy Kane, a former student of Martins. Kane spares Martin, but only after shooting his hands. Years later, Martin meets an escaped convict, wrongly convicted for the train robbery. Martin trains his new student and both men seek out Billy Kane.

programme.title: Beauty and the Bandit
programme.desc: In Old California, a Frenchman carrying silver is ambushed by Cisco, a bandit claiming the money belongs to the poor. When the "Frenchman" is revealed to be Jeanne DuBois, she follows Cisco to his lair. As romance blooms, Cisco offers to return the silver to her. Jeanne must now choose between her deal and aiding Ciscos quest to help the needy.

programme.title: Man Who Cried for Revenge
programme.desc: Davy Flanagan, a former Union officer who was part of an attempt to break out of a Confederate prison camp during the Civil War and suffered a blow to the head that left him with amnesia. Then a bounty hunter shows up to collect a bounty on his head as a deserter.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid Returns
programme.desc: Cisco Kid stops Rosita’s marriage to Harris, claiming she’s his wife and presenting a borrowed child, Nancy, as proof. After Nancy’s father is killed, Cisco protects her from schemers Harris and Conway, who want her inheritance. With clever plotting, Cisco and Pancho outwit the villains to ensure Nancy’s safety.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 34, 35, 36
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Spencers Holiday BBQ
programme.desc: Join charismatic chef Spencer Watts at his glorious rooftop patio for a one-hour special featuring a full holiday spread, all made on the BBQ. Spencer’s festive menu is all about creative BBQ twists with his delectable, mouth-watering recipes including Burnt Orange Cranberry Marmalade, Maple Rye Pumpkin Pie, and Asparagus with Smoked Salmon Dip. Save room for the piece de Q-sistance: Smoked Turkey Two Ways. This year, take your holiday feast outside and serve up something deliciously different.

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Twists on the Classics
programme.desc: Christmas is right around the corner and it calls for a little fun - like a twist on traditional holiday desserts! FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: TWISTS ON THE CLASSICS offers a new take on some of your favourites to bring you a fresh perspective and world of flavour for the holidays! Enchanting host Jessica McGovern plays off classic desserts, serving up handy hints on how to get the most out of every bite. From sweet and fluffy Gumdrop Cakes drizzled with a light lemony glaze to a delectable Eggnog Ski Slope Cake decorated with rosemary trees and a few friends to hit the hills, Jessicas unique holiday recipes will surly make it on your list of Christmas traditions!

programme.title: One World Kitchen Bakes the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One World Kitchen Bakes the Holidays
programme.desc: Celebrate the holidays with One World Kitchens baked treats from Italy, Japan, Thailand, and Argentina. Our hosts Vanessa, Hana, Pailin, and Natalia put a global twist on classic recipes with Panforte, honey-drizzled Struffoli, Matcha Cheesecake, Thai Shortbread Cookies, Turron, and Pan Dulce. Our warm hosts serve up sweet treats inspired by traditions and family secrets. One World Kitchen: Bakes the Holidays will put you in the festive spirit and bring new holiday traditions to your home!

programme.title: Michael Bonacinis Christmas at the Farm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Michael Bonacinis Christmas at the Farm
programme.desc: In this heartwarming holiday special, Chef Michael Bonacini invites us to his cozy farmhouse in Ontario for a charming Christmas feast. In this scenic winter retreat, Bonacini interprets classic Welsh and Italian Christmas dishes from his childhood. Michael cooks up comforting dishes from hearty potato leek soup, to succulent roast lamb, to classic molten chocolate lava cake. As he explores homey Christmas flavours, Michael shares his traditions and gives tips for perfecting the holiday meal.

programme.title: Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.desc: Spencer Watts serves up his take on traditional holiday fare, showing us that you can make an impressive dinner without the stress. In this cheerful one-hour special, charming bachelor Spencer takes you through all the planning tips and lets you in on his secrets to create the ultimate holiday meal.

programme.title: BLITZN
programme.desc: Get ready for a special holiday BLITZ! with master mixologist Yvonne Langen as she prepares her favorite holiday cocktails and party snacks in the Gusto TV kitchen!

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kohlrabi, Fennel, Kale and Red Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera shows us why fresh is always best with two creative dishes using ingredients from the farmers market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Raspberries, Mint, Peas and Apricot
programme.desc: Zestful cook Amanda Herrera scoops up raspberries, peas, mint, and apricots to use in three summer recipes.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Collard Greens, Maple Syrup, Goat Cheddar and Heirloom Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera prepares a frittata, rosemary skewer chicken and grilled bread salad with fresh ingredients from a local farmers market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Broccoli, Rainbow Chard and Herbs
programme.desc: Warm host Amanda Herrera picks up colourful produce and herbs at a farmers market to make a delicious appetizer and tasty cold oil French fries.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Thai food inspired by other cultures
programme.desc: Thai chef and cookbook author Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how to make Thai dishes that were inspired by other cultures, from steamed dumplings to biryani to Massaman curry and custard tarts.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Argentinian-born chef Natalia Machado makes grilled calamari salad, followed by grilled pizza, and then shows us how to make lamb ravioli, before finishing it off with the best-ever cookies: alfajores.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Warm and talented Cantonese home cook Mary Tang kick starts this One World Kitchen 3 episode by show- casing traditional, evERS-popular dim-sum dishes. First up, juicy Pork-Filled Dumplings! Made with fresh watERS-chest- nuts, shiitake mushrooms and a blend of Asian sauces and spices, these sweet and salty bite-sized creations are to die for! To add to our desire, Mary fries up some savoury Chinese Daikon Radish Cakes in a piping hot wok. Next, a flavourful lotus leaf filled with sticky rice and a medley of salted duck eggs, Shaoxing wine, and dried shrimp is truly hard to resist! To finish off, Mary combines gorgeous Adzuki beans with rice flour and sesame seeds to create airy and full...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Vietnamese food with a French Twist
programme.desc: Lisa Nguyen, a passionate and fun-loving Vietnamese home cook, introduces us to some of her favourite Vietnamese dishes with a French flare. Set in the colourful One World Kitchen 3 kitchen, Lisa assembles a classic Vietnamese sandwich. Golden-brown sauteed onions, salty bacon, tangy pickled carrots and daikon, and flavourful ground pork pte pressed between two slices of crispy baguette will definitely get your mouth salivating. Next up, hot pork lathered in cognac inside a crunchy golden puff pastry. Moving away from pork, Lisa then cooks up a hearty plate of Shaking Beef with a leafy watercress salad on the side. Finally, Lisa shows us her Vietnamese play on a traditional French...

programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Vietnam, Lebanon, China, Germany
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Vietnam - Vietnamese Green Beans, Lebanon - Watermelon Tabbouleh, China - Signapore-Style Spaghetti Squash Noodles, and Germany - Celeriac Sauerbraten and Slaw!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Italy, Morocco, Ethiopia, Jamaica
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Italy - Roasted Radishes and Radish Pesto, Morocco - Moroccan Spiced Apples, Ethiopia - Ethiopian Spinach Dip, and Jamaica - Jerk Shiitakes with Coconut Rice!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Korea, Russia, Spain, El Salvador
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by South Korea - Jicama Kimchi, Russia - Roasted Eggplant Salad, Spain - Quinoa Paella, and El Salvador - Salvadorian Grilled Iceberg Lettuce Wedge!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Indonesia, Greece, Syria, Thailand
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Indonesia - Tomato Nasi Goreng, Greece - Greek Melon Salad, Syria - Kidney Bean Hummus, and Thailand - Coconut Curry Cabbage Rolls!

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Honeycomb, Shallots and Iceberg Lettuce
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms fresh market ingredients into two irresistible dishes, including a one pot Lamb Curry with Honeycomb.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Patty Pan Summer Squash and Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera grills up two dinner recipes using patty pan summer squash and cabbage that she picked up from the market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners

programme.desc: Using cream, sunflower oil and cherry tomatoes from the market, host Amanda Herrera makes an irresistible pasta recipe and indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini uses the fresh ingredients from rich Tuscan soil to make regional dishes like Spinach Ricotta Gnudi.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini explores classic dishes from the central Italian region, Le Marche.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: The secluded region of Abruzzo makes for unique Italian cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini shows us diverse regional recipes like Rolled Meat Crepes.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Pasta, bread, pizza dough! Host Michael Bonacini makes Apulian classics like Artichoke Cheese Panzerotti.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of Vietnamese style clams, braised greens, balsamic Cipollini onions, pork chops with grilled peaches, and avocado cake with avocado frosting.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Theres nothing more authentic than street food - Vietnamese style! Host Lisa Nguyen shares her tips and tricks on tasty Lemongrass-infused Beef Wraps. A vast array of ingredients including peppery betel leaves, gorgeous greens and crunchy peanuts complement the tenderness of flavoursome, marinated ground beef. Lisas next dish is an iconic Vietnamese street food - crispy Sizzling Crepes with juicy pork belly and earthy vegetables will definitely activate your taste buds. For dessert, Lisa whips up a batch of sweet coconut pudding using beautiful bananas and velvety coconut milk sprinkled with roasted sesame seeds for some crunch.

programme.title: Pressures On
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Four Flavours, Four Dishes…One Multi-Cooker!
programme.desc: Using just one pot, host Vanessa Gianfrancesco cooks four delicious dishes including Peachy Pulled Pork Tacos and a Lime and Basil Pie.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Say goodbye to dirty cutlery in this One World Kitchen 3 episode featuring Vietnamese finger foods! Talented cook Lisa Nguyen starts off by making delicious Pork Skewer Rolls - perfect for any party! Featuring tender pork, crispy lettuce, fresh mint, crunchy cucumber, and Chinese chives wrapped in soft rice paper, this dish pairs well with a nuoc cham dipping sauce. Sticky Lemongrass Spare Ribs are next up to the plate; steamed and marinated in a garlicy, caramel glaze (yum!). Next, Lisa fries up some tasty Shrimp and Sweet Potato Fritters using a foolproof technique, adding nuoc cham dipping sauce and lovely Bibb lettuce on the side. Finally, fingERS-licking Vietnamese Coffee Cupcakes...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 A Banquet fit for an Emperor
programme.desc: Elegant Vietnamese fare is often inspired by legendary imperial city cuisine. In this One World Kitchen 3 episode, Host Lisa Nguyen gives us a magical taste of royalty with four colourful and delectable dishes. To start, Lisa ex- quisitely assembles a nice little starter for a royal dinner party - delicious Rice Cakes with Dried Shrimp. Next, she kicks it up a notch with a Spicy Hue Beef Noodle Soup - a truly slurp-worthy dish! For a touch of sweetness, Lisa then steams caramelized pork and tender shrimp dumplings in a lovely banana leaf. And theres no such thing as a classy Vietnamese dinner party without Baby Clams with Rice! The blend of contrasting flavours and textures in this...

Han onnistuu takavarikoimaan jattimaisen hasiseran, jonka seka poliisi etta alamaailma haluavat, ja kenttakokemuksellaan ja poliisin resursseilla han aloittaa oman rikollisen toimintansa ja vaihtaa huumediilerin uraan.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: The Rum Diary
programme.desc: Hunter S. Thompsonin Rommipaivakirja-romaaniin pohjautuva elokuva seuraa kiertolaiselamaa viettavan reportteri Paul Kempin (Johnny Depp) viinanhuuruista matkaa halki Puerto Ricon pittoreskin saaren. Han on pian omaksunut paikallisvaeston rommiinhukuttautuvan elamantavan, ja tavattuaan hamarabisneksiin sekaantuneen amerikkalaisliikemiehen, Sandersonin (Aaron Eckhart), Paul on myos korviaan myoten retkussa miehen huumaavan kuumaan kihlattuun, Chenaultiin (Amber Heard).

programme.title: 200 Cigarettes
programme.desc: On uudenvuodenaatto New Yorkissa vuonna 1981. Monica aikoo pitaa juhlat, mutta kello yhdeksaan mennessa kukaan ilmestynyt paikalle. Hanen vieraansa ovat tulossa, mutta he eivat pida kiiretta. Kevinilla ei ole halua juhlia uutta vuotta, koska hanet on vastikaan jatetty. Val ja Stephie eksyvat ja paatyvat klubille. Bridget ja Caitlyn yrittavat paasta eroon Bridgetin poikaystavasta Ericista. Kaikki he etsivat seksia, rakkautta tai molempia.

programme.title: Rosso
programme.desc: Roadmovieta ja rikosdraamaa taidokkaasti yhdisteleva Rosso on kertomus sisilialaisesta palkkamurhaajasta Giancarlo Rossosta, joka on tullut Suomeen etsimaan seuraavaa kohdettaan, joka sattuu olemaan hanen rakastettunsa Marja. Odottamattomasti Rosso saa jaljitysapua Marjan veljelta Martilta, vaikkei heilla ole edes yhteista kielta. Matkalle mahtuu niin romuttamokeikka kuin pari ryostoakin..

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: Keinottelua
programme.desc: Menestyvan liikemiehen Robert Millerin (Gere) taydelliselta vaikuttava elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen yhden kohtalokkaan erehdyksen seurauksena. Miller loytaa itsensa tasapainoilemasta perhe-elaman, yrityskauppojen, uhkaavan kavallussyytteen ja syrjahypyn ristipaineessa. Saatuaan viela sinnikkaan poliisietsiva Michael Bryerin (Roth) peraansa, joutuu Miller epatoivoiseen kujanjuoksuun yrittaessaan korjata tekemansa virheet ennen kuplan puhkeamista.

programme.title: Puhdistaja (Walking Tall)
programme.desc: Kun on kyse lain noudattamisesta, yksi mies voi tehda eron! Toimintatahti Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson ei ota vankeja taistellessaan oikeuden puolesta ja murskatessaan korruptiota tassa tarinassa miehesta, joka ottaa kantaa… ja ottaa kaupunkinsa takaisin!

programme.title: Fatman
programme.desc: Vinksahtaneessa nykymaailmassa Joulupukki on todella olemassa ja vararikossa, koska lapset ovat enimmakseen tuhmia eika valtiolta heru tukea tyovoimakuluihin kysynnan laskiessa. Joulupukki on ryypiskeleva, asetta heilutteleva pahis, koska kun lentelee ympari maailmaa, joku voi joskus ampua.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Matrix 4, Spartacus ja NCIS: New Orleansistakin tuttu Ellen Hollman elamansa roolissa henkihieveriin piestyna naisena, jonka kosto on armoton ja perinpohjainen. Nuori pariskunta lahtee telttailemaan Alabaman metsiin, mutta romanttinen irtiotto arjesta menee kammottavalla tavalla pieleen, kun he tormaavat vakivaltaiseen huumekartelliin. Kartellin miehet tappavat Brennerin aviomiehen Dillonin (Matt Passmore) ja jattavat Brennerin kuolemaan - tai ainakin luulivat jattavansa. Kaikkensa menettanyt Brenner lahtee kostoretkelle, jota kukaan ei osannut odottaa ja jolta yksikaan ei voi valttya. Rajahtavaa toimintaa, joka intensiteetillaan naulitsee katsojan penkkiin jo alkumetreilta!
Nuoren kirjailijan on hyvaksyttava kuolevaisuutensa kun hanella todetaan harvinainen syopa.Parhaan ystavansa ja empaattisen nuoren terapeutin avulla han loytaa rohkeuden taistella sairautta vastaan.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: Saints Of War
programme.desc: Jersey, 1942. Kanaalisaaret miehitetaan Hitlerin vahvistaessa otettaan Lansi-Euroopasta. Saksalaiset kayttavat saarta sotavankien tyoleirien tukikohtana, ja paikallisen, tiiviin yhteison tulevaisuus hailyy epavarmuuden ja pelon valilla, kuluttaen asukkaiden luonnetta ja koetellen keskinaista luottamusta.

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: Time Out of Mind
programme.desc: George on epatoivoinen mies. Hanen terveytensa horjuu ja hanella ei ole mitaan minka puoleen kaantya, ja pian han loytaa itsensa New York Cityn anteeksiantamattomilta kaduilta. Kaytettyaan loppuun kaikki valiaikaisen majoituksen vaihtoehdot han hakee turvapaikkaa Bellevuen sairaalasta, Mahattanin suurimmasta kodittomien miesten vastaanottokeskuksesta. Sekin osoittautuu raaaksi ja vaikeakulkuiseksi ymparistoksi taynna samalla tavalla syrjaytyneita sieluja. Mutta Georgen ystavystyttya kokeneeseen yomaja-asukkiin Dixoniin han alkaa kypsytella mielessaan toivoa siita, etta saisi korjattua suhteen tyttareensa, josta on vieraantunut.

programme.title: Kirjava huntu (The Painted Veil)
programme.desc: Laakari Walter Fane ja hanen vaimonsa Kitty ovat komennuksella Shanghaissa, jossa Walter on toissa paikallisessa sairaalassa. Walterin vaativa tyo vie kaiken liikenevan ajan ja yksinainen Kitty ajautuu englantilaisen diplomaatin Charles Townsendin syleilyyn. Kun Walter saa tietaa vaimonsa uskottomuudesta, han janoaa kostoa. Walter hyvaksyy vaarallisen tyon kiinalaisessa pikkukylassa, jossa riehuu kuolettava koleraepidemia. Kittylla ei ole muuta mahdollisuutta kuin seurata miestaan maaseudulle kauas kaikesta.

programme.title: Elegy
programme.desc: David Kepesh on arvostettu yliopiston professori, jonka maailma jarkkyy, kun hanen luennoilleen ilmestyy kaunis Consuela Castillo. Consuelan kauneus ajaa professorin himon ja omistushalun pyorteeseen, jollaista han ei ole aiemmin kokenut. Mutkikas rakkaustarina saa alkunsa. Perustuu Pulitzer-palkitun Philip Rothin teokseen.
Nuoren kirjailijan on hyvaksyttava kuolevaisuutensa kun hanella todetaan harvinainen syopa.Parhaan ystavansa ja empaattisen nuoren terapeutin avulla han loytaa rohkeuden taistella sairautta vastaan.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: The Blair Witch Project seuraa elokuvantekijoiden triota, joka olisi pitanyt olla yksinkertainen kavely metsassa, mutta siita tulee nopeasti retki sydanta pysayttavaan kauhuun. Kun nama kolme menetetaan selittamattomasti, moraali heikkenee. Nalka alkaa. Syytokset lentavat. Matkansa lahestyessa he ymmartavat, etta se, mita he nyt kuvaavat, ei ole legenda ... vaan heidan oma laskeutumisensa kuvittelemattomaan kauhuun.

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: Nuori israelilaismies Yossi Ghinsberg hylkaa turvallisen tulevaisuuden ja lahtee jahtaamaan unelmaansa Amazonin sademetsan salaperaisissa syvyyksissa. Vuoden ajan han kulkee tunnettuja reitteja, mutta kun han ja kaksi uutta matkakumppania, Kevin Gale ja Marcus Stamm, seuraavat synkan karismaattista Karl Ruchprecteria viidakkoon, unelman toteutus muuttuu psyykkiseksi voimien ja rohkeuden mitteloksi. Tositarina aarioloissa selviytymisesta. Perustuu Yossi Ghinsbergin menestysmuistelmiin.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Matrix 4, Spartacus ja NCIS: New Orleansistakin tuttu Ellen Hollman elamansa roolissa henkihieveriin piestyna naisena, jonka kosto on armoton ja perinpohjainen. Nuori pariskunta lahtee telttailemaan Alabaman metsiin, mutta romanttinen irtiotto arjesta menee kammottavalla tavalla pieleen, kun he tormaavat vakivaltaiseen huumekartelliin. Kartellin miehet tappavat Brennerin aviomiehen Dillonin (Matt Passmore) ja jattavat Brennerin kuolemaan - tai ainakin luulivat jattavansa. Kaikkensa menettanyt Brenner lahtee kostoretkelle, jota kukaan ei osannut odottaa ja jolta yksikaan ei voi valttya. Rajahtavaa toimintaa, joka intensiteetillaan naulitsee katsojan penkkiin jo alkumetreilta!

programme.title: Arvottomat
programme.desc: Mika Kaurismaen ensimmainen pitka elokuva. Kasikirjoituksen han teki yhdessa veljensa Akin kanssa. Arvottomat on ajaton kuvaus siita kuinka Pikkurikollinen Manne, maalaispoika Harri ja kaunis Veera ajavat Volgalla lapi katoavien suomalaismaisemien, poliisien ja gangsterien roikkuessa herkeamatta kintereilla.. Vauhdikasta matkaa siivittavat mm. Juicen ja Rauli Baddingin ikivihreat kappaleet.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As Joe fights a Transport Canada claim against the airline, star pilot Justin is tasked with shipping an 8,000lb generator to a remote town.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Crusty mechanic Chuck leads the scramble to ready the Electra for a disaster relief mission in Haiti, but fates curveball sends them to the High Arctic instead.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graemes fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikeys much-planned D-Day tribute parachute jump with 20 paratroopers hits a wall when Joe refuses to fly his DC-3 to the drop zone.
