programme.title: Backpacking Quebec – Part 3
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Epic Trails S3 - "Backpacking Quebec – Part 3"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson battles the elements while backpacking during an early season snowstorm in Charlevoix, and then gets his adrenaline pumping with a whitewater run down the mighty Ottawa River.

programme.title: The Spiritual Adventure
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Road Less Traveled S1 - "The Spiritual Adventure"
programme.desc: Fleeing the hard monsoon rains, Jonathan seeks refuge with hot cups of java in the rolling hills of India’s coffee country and in the peaceful energy of India’s largest Tibetan community.

programme.title: Kerala Kaleidoscope
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Road Less Traveled S1 - "Kerala Kaleidoscope"
programme.desc: Jonathan hangs out with a group of fisherman that utilizes the ancient Chinese fishing nets designed in the time of Kublai khan. He attends a Kathakali dance academy and gets ready for center stage with an elaborate 3 hour makeup process.

programme.title: Adrift Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Fight to Survive S2 - "Adrift Pt. 1"
programme.desc: In what is regarded as one of greatest survival stories of the 20th Century, sailor Steven Callahan finds himself alone and adrift in a life raft after his boat, the Napoleon Solo, sinks in the mid Atlantic.

programme.title: Adrift Pt. 2
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Fight to Survive S2 - "Adrift Pt. 2"
programme.desc: Facing starvation, dehydration and predators from the deep, sailor Steven Callahan fights to survive not only the physical hardships, but also the mental and emotional strain of being adrift and alone in a disintegrating life raft.

programme.title: Cloudy Days
programme.desc: On day two of the hunting season, Chris and Kaid explore downstream for a better location and fish. Meanwhile, Casey and R.L. savor salmon for protein. Alaska is pounded by massive storm clouds.

programme.title: Soaked Spirits
programme.desc: R.L. opens up to Casey about the trials that led him to realize the importance of Be Alive. Chris and Kaid are holed up in the tent at the mercy of the Alaskan weather. Casey and R.L. find some food.

programme.title: 1,000 Tuna Quest
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Man Eats Wild S2 - "1,000 Tuna Quest"
programme.desc: Mario travels to the outer limits of the Eastern Coast of Canada to a place called Prince Edward Island. Home to some of the biggest bluefin tuna on the planet, these fish can grow up to 1,000 pounds.

programme.title: Poisoned in the Amazon
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Poisoned in the Amazon"
programme.desc: In search of the biggest predatorial freshwater fish, Mario ventures deep into the darkest corners of the Amazon jungle where a tribal ceremony leaves him poisoned by a deadly frog.

programme.title: Day Three Pt. 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Pt. 1"
programme.desc: Its the third and final day of competition for the remaining 3 teams in this intense shark tournament. See how the first half of the day turns out.

programme.title: Day Three Pt.2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Pt.2"
programme.desc: Day three continues at Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West, FL. Our three remaining 2-man teams are doing everything they can to find, catch and release the biggest sharks they can for points with only one goal in mind, bring home the trophy and the title.

programme.title: The Gift of Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Love"
programme.desc: With a tank full of gas donated by a “would-be traveler”, Leon and Kindness One® leave LA and try their luck in Sin City before finding help from a Scotsman in an out of the way Western town in Colorado, inspires his first surprise gift.

programme.title: Ice Climbers
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Ice Climbers"
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation battles winter weather to ferry ice climbers onto the Knik Glacier.

programme.title: Without a Trace
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Without a Trace"
programme.desc: Tanalian Aviation pilots Joel Natwick and Josiah Freeman assist with a search and rescue for an experienced hiker deep in the winter wilderness.

programme.title: Dropped Origins: Behind the Scenes
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 Dropped S8 - "Dropped Origins: Behind the Scenes"
programme.desc: A look at life behind the lens from the men that make it happen.

programme.title: The Best of Dropped
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 Dropped S8 - "The Best of Dropped"
programme.desc: Relive all your favorite moments from Dropped Seasons.

programme.title: Surviving Nature’s Fury – Storms
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving Nature’s Fury – Storms"
programme.desc: Nick and Laura experience Nature’s fury through storm amazing generating gear that simulates terrible hurricanes, ice cold winds and even tornados. For these experiments they’ll use remarkable technology that creates massive storms on Hollywood sets.

programme.title: Surviving a Mountain Lion Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Mountain Lion Attack"
programme.desc: Laura and Nick explore the techniques to deal with these apex predators when they are the most dangerous. We’ll scientifically breakdown the behaviors, strength, eyesight and speed of mountain lions through outrageous experiments, in day and night.

programme.title: LOST!
programme.desc: Nick and Laura head deep into the mountains to explore survival techniques that go far beyond anything they’ve learned before. Our courageous hosts subject themselves to intense survival training with the Survival Training School of California.

programme.title: Nightmare Canyon - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Fight to Survive S3 - "Nightmare Canyon - Part 1"
programme.desc: Justin and Jeremy Harris’ weekend decent into a remote Utah canyon becomes a survival nightmare when Justin severely breaks his leg. As night fast approaches and temperatures drop below freezing, how will these two brothers survive?

programme.title: Nightmare Canyon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Fight to Survive S3 - "Nightmare Canyon - Part 2"
programme.desc: After Justin Harris severely breaks his leg deep in a remote, Utah canyon, it ‘s up to his brother Jeremy to climb out for help. Clawing his way through icy pools of water and up rock faces, pushes Jeremy to his limit.

programme.title: Under The Desert Sun
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Fight to Survive S3 - "Under The Desert Sun"
programme.desc: Ed Rosenthal set out for a short hike in Joshua Tree National Park, but in the heat of the day he became turned around and lost. His six-day ordeal of survival in blazing temperatures with no food or water is nothing short of miraculous.

programme.title: National Day
programme.desc: In Israel, back-to-back Memorial and Independence Days put heavy demands on Magen David Adom. In Belgium, the July 21 national holiday draws over 200,000 people, triggering a surge in medical emergencies.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.desc: Ibiza’s medical services face heavy strain during tourist season, often due to late-night excesses. In Thailand, nurses work tirelessly at the Full Moon Party to keep international revelers safe.

programme.title: Carnival
programme.desc: Rio’s Carnival—a week of samba and celebrations—often sends many to the ER. At Barcelona’s La Mercè Festival, first aid stations care for the injured, sick, and intoxicated.

programme.title: WOMEN POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Police Patrol S1 - "WOMEN POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In Hyderabad, India, wealth and poverty coexist side by side. Each day, 15,000 officers battle crime ranging from theft to interreligious violence. In Palestine, 8,500 police face an even tougher challenge—working across a fragmented, politically tense landscape where every patrol carries risk.

programme.title: MEDITERRANEAN - HARBOUR POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Police Patrol S1 - "MEDITERRANEAN - HARBOUR POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In Catalonia, the regional police have taken over from Spain’s national force, deploying a rapid-response motorcycle unit to tackle urban crime. Meanwhile in Haifa, Israel’s main port city, police operate under strict laws in a tense environment shaped by terrorism threats and ongoing regional conflict.

programme.title: RIVER POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Police Patrol S1 - "RIVER POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In Brazil, the Paraná River is a major trafficking route—patrolled by NEPOM, a specialized river police unit. In Guayaquil, Ecuador, police join forces with local communities to combat all forms of trafficking on the ground.

programme.title: Columbian Cowboys
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Columbian Cowboys"
programme.desc: Mario heads to the Flatlands of Columbia where he teams up with mystical cowboys of the land and goes in search of electric eel.

programme.title: Pyrenees Mountains
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Pyrenees Mountains"
programme.desc: Mario ventures high into the Pyrenees mountain range in search of the elusive chamois, and decides to meet up with an old friend who is one of Frances best wine makers.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Like Father, Like Son"
programme.desc: In Cordoba, Argentina doves and pigeons are considered to be in plague proportions and culling them is necessary to maintain balance in the region... however, things turn a little competitive when Mario brings his dad to help.

programme.title: Day Three Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Begins"
programme.desc: Day three ends at Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West, Florida, on the Madfin Shark Series and there can bo only one Madfin Shark Champion.

programme.title: Dropped Origins: Behind the Scenes
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 Dropped S8 - "Dropped Origins: Behind the Scenes"
programme.desc: A look at life behind the lens from the men that make it happen.

programme.title: The Best of Dropped
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 Dropped S8 - "The Best of Dropped"
programme.desc: Relive all your favorite moments from Dropped Seasons.

programme.title: Far North Bluewater Mission
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Far North Bluewater Mission"
programme.desc: 60 nautical miles + 200kg of Burley divided by 3 keen spearos = mayhem. The team go wide this week, overnighting aboard The Orca in 1000m of water in the Far North, in an attempt to create a 24-hour trail capable of attracting in who knows what!

programme.title: Hardcore Hapuka
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Hardcore Hapuka"
programme.desc: We return to Fiordland in the hope of going one step better in slotting a hapuka on a spear, but the presence of Bluefin Tuna off the coast, and Wapiti Bulls on the slip faces proves a tempting distraction from the task at hand!

programme.title: Pitt Island Expedition
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 South Seas Spearo S2 - "Pitt Island Expedition"
programme.desc: Following a ridiculous sequence of events in Fiordland, the team saddle up and head for the hapuka haven of the Chatham Islands, where they spend a few days diving the spectacular and remote Pitt Island.

programme.title: Tree Stand Nightmare
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Fight to Survive S3 - "Tree Stand Nightmare"
programme.desc: When avid bow hunter, Dr. Joe Baumgardner sets out to do routine maintenance on his tree stands, a twenty two foot fall leaves him with a severely broken leg and miles from help in the deep Mississippi woods.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 1"
programme.desc: While solo climbing Mt. Goddard, a remote peak in the California Sierra, Gregg Hein’s leg is crushed by a boulder and he’s sent careening down the mountain. Barely able to stop his fall, he’s now faced with a horrific compound fracture.

programme.title: Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Fight to Survive S3 - "Crushed By A Boulder - Part 2"
programme.desc: After his leg is crushed by a boulder, Gregg Hein is stranded on a high Sierra peak with an infected compound fracture. Knowing he won’t be reported missing for days, Gregg attempts to crawl off the mountain and rescue himself.

programme.title: South Korea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Quest S1 - "South Korea"
programme.desc: Follow Bill as he tours a medieval aristocrats massive fortress that mirrors the Forbidden City. From giant burial mounds, to new Olympic sites, to still moving food, join Bill as he finds the soul of this modern ancient country.

programme.title: Yap
programme.desc: The craziest dive though is when he feeds dozens of sharks with no protective gear. Trying to top that on land, Bill makes a mind blowing deal with a local chief to film where no one has filmed before…The Forbidden Island.

programme.title: Donsol, Philippines
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Donsol, Philippines"
programme.desc: Disaster and triumph set this show apart. The brothers start out with a near death boat disaster in the southern Philippine Sea but bounce back and end up attaining their goal of reaching Donsol village, the whale shark capitol of the world.

programme.title: Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Ryozenji Temple Shikoku, Japan"
programme.desc: In this episode the brothers shun the more famous areas, Tokyo and Kyoto, and head to the isolated, ancient island of Shikoku. Their route is the ancient 88 Temple Zen pilgrimage circuit.

programme.title: New Zealand
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Epic Trails S3 - "New Zealand"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson explores the stunning backpacking trails around Mount Taranaki and Mount Hikurangi on New Zealand’s North Island.

programme.title: Season 1 “Best of”
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Road Less Traveled S1 - "Season 1 “Best of”"
programme.desc: Jonathan is back in India to host a special episode which explores his vast archive of experiences throughout India. Jonathan also reveals an exclusive insight into the inner workings of the show, how everything is put together and behind the scenes.

programme.title: Amsterdam to Morocco
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Road Less Traveled S2 - "Amsterdam to Morocco"
programme.desc: Jonathan starts off the season by exploring Dutch curiosities, and then hops on the worlds largest cargo ship enroute for Morocco, where a whole new adventure starts

programme.title: Underwater
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Underwater"
programme.desc: Starting at Old Dragon’s Head, Ash continues west to meet a Wall Protector who has dedicated his life to preserving this iconic monument, before gearing up for an unexpected adventure: scuba diving the ruins of the Great Wall of China.

programme.title: Beijing and beyond
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Beijing and beyond"
programme.desc: Ash has made it to Beijing, where he’s meeting Terry Townsend to learn more about wildlife conservation in the region around the Great Wall of China. He also meets two more Wall Protectors and samples local delicacies in Shi Xia Village.

programme.title: Eagles Neck
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Eagles Neck"
programme.desc: In his toughest challenge so far, Ash takes on Eagle’s Neck – a notoriously steep and dangerous section of the Great Wall of China. But first, he meets tech experts who’ve been helping to digitally map The Great Wall in an effort to protect it.

programme.title: Inner Mongolia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Inner Mongolia"
programme.desc: Following the Great Wall west, Ash heads to Inner Mongolia to meet up with a nomadic family and to try Mongolian wrestling. He’s hoping to visit Naadam Festival, which features a key part of Mongolian culture: horseracing.

programme.title: Desert Survival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Desert Survival"
programme.desc: Ash heads into the desert to meet up with Wu Xinlei, who is a survival expert. He’s hoping to understand what it would have been like for the people who built The Great Wall in this remote and punishing landscape.

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Road Less Traveled S4 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: Jonathan Legg is in Asia’s world city, Hong Kong! With all things opulent and luxurious; high end art collectors to the priciest wines in the world, super car aficionados and helicopter getaways from skyscraper rooftops; this is the road less traveled from a different point of view.

programme.title: Cape Breton Island, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Cape Breton Island, Canada"
programme.desc: By pick-up truck, the brothers route is the culturally and geographically rich island of Cape Breton and the Cabot Trail. Lobster fishing, hooking, moose sightings, Bingo, Scottish ceilidhs, Mikmaq drum session, its all happening in this episode.

programme.title: Volcan Madera, Nicaragua
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Volcan Madera, Nicaragua"
programme.desc: The brothers attain their goal of riding motorcycles to the heart of Nicaragua, through the jungle to the isolated beaches of the Pacific coast and back inland: through Spanish-colonial towns, local villages and the huge volcanic island of Ometepe.

programme.title: Yorkshire Dales, England
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Yorkshire Dales, England"
programme.desc: Imagine a 26-pub, 7-day, 60-mile pub-crawl! Doing a traditional ‘ramble’ through the stunning Yorkshire Dales region of northern England, the brother’s stride through the moors and dales and peaks and valleys - legs and livers intact.

programme.title: Banff and Lake Louise
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Epic Trails S1 - "Banff and Lake Louise"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes heli hiking and caving while exploring Canada’s first and most popular National Park and neighboring Lake Louise.

programme.title: Australia’s Northern Territory
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Epic Trails S1 - "Australia’s Northern Territory"
programme.desc: Eric Hanson heads down under to explore the Larapinta Trail and Kakadu National Park.

programme.title: Fiji
programme.desc: Eric Hanson goes off the beaten path as he hikes from one remote village to the next through Fiji’s mountainous landscape.

programme.title: Mongolia
programme.desc: There is nothing on earth that compares to Mongolia. Here the last nomadic people range their livestock over millions of acres of grasslands. Drinking fermented mare’s milk (worst tasting drink ever), riding a yak and finding the original wild horses

programme.title: North Pole
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Travel Quest S1 - "North Pole"
programme.desc: The crew takes an icebreaker to the North Pole just in time to make a satellite phone call to wish Bills mother a happy birthday (she is so shocked she doesnt recognize him). We also track and film the biggest predators on earth…polar bears.

programme.title: Rwanda…Gorillas
programme.desc: Bill tracks through never ending mud, heavy vegetation and steep mountains, to come face-to-face with our mighty cousins. He also traces the life, and finds the remnants, of the camp of one of his idols - Diane Fossey.

programme.title: The Gift of Security
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Security"
programme.desc: Leon goes deep into working life on a cattle ranch in Nebraska – literally. Has bike trouble in Chicago, before being shunned by the Amish, but a chance encounter with a homeless man in Pittsburgh, leaves him transformed and inspires his next gift.

programme.title: The Gift of Inspiration
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Inspiration"
programme.desc: Leon finds refuge in the world’s toughest city, works his way across the Atlantic aboard a cargo ship. A Spanish customs issue threatens to derail his journey, and the music of two African musicians in southern France, inspires his next gift.

programme.title: The Gift of Transformation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Kindness Diaries S1 - "The Gift of Transformation"
programme.desc: After striking out in St. Tropez, and getting lost in the Italian countryside, Leon finds shelter in 18th Century villa outside Torino, but his luck runs out on the shores of Lake Como.

programme.title: Separate Riders
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Roads End S1 - "Separate Riders"
programme.desc: Rob and Dave’s patience are pushed to the limits as the whole trip hangs in the balance of Rob’s broken clutch. Will they have to buy a new bike?

programme.title: Inner Mongolia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Inner Mongolia"
programme.desc: Following the Great Wall west, Ash heads to Inner Mongolia to meet up with a nomadic family and to try Mongolian wrestling. He’s hoping to visit Naadam Festival, which features a key part of Mongolian culture: horseracing.

programme.title: Desert Survival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Desert Survival"
programme.desc: Ash heads into the desert to meet up with Wu Xinlei, who is a survival expert. He’s hoping to understand what it would have been like for the people who built The Great Wall in this remote and punishing landscape.

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Road Less Traveled S4 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: Jonathan Legg is in Asia’s world city, Hong Kong! With all things opulent and luxurious; high end art collectors to the priciest wines in the world, super car aficionados and helicopter getaways from skyscraper rooftops; this is the road less traveled from a different point of view.

programme.title: Botswana
programme.desc: Botswana is a wildlife lover’s dream with massive herds of elephants, immense pods of hippos and some of the largest prides of lions anywhere. It’s also the home of Victoria Falls…the largest falls in the world.

programme.title: New Zealand and Australia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Travel Quest S1 - "New Zealand and Australia"
programme.desc: Bill has always been fascinated with the Americas Cup yacht racing – it’s as intense as the name implies. But the big adventure is riding in, and then flying, a Soviet Mig Jet doing stunts and mind numbing close fly-bys.

programme.title: Kenyas Great Grasslands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Travel Quest S1 - "Kenyas Great Grasslands"
programme.desc: Bicycling is a safe and leisurely activity, until you decide to do it through the wilderness of Kenya with large lion, elephant and buffalo populations.

programme.title: Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Erg Chigagga, Sahara, Morocco"
programme.desc: From Marrakesh, the brothers take a series of local Berber taxis over the High Atlas Mountains and down into the Draa Valley until the road ends at the edge of the great sand sea of the Sahara where they bury some treasure.

programme.title: Arviat, Nunavut, Canada
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Arviat, Nunavut, Canada"
programme.desc: Heading to the far north into the Arctic to learn about the Inuit’s traditional culture and incredible way of life, the brothers accompany an elder and young hunter on a 200-mile skidoo hunt across the barren land and frozen sea ice.

programme.title: Kushtia, Bangladesh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Kushtia, Bangladesh"
programme.desc: The brothers traverse the country’s interconnecting network of waterways by ferryboat. From shrimp baron, to peasant fishermen, lofty temple ruins to anonymous chai wallahs, they make their way to Kushtia, home to the shrine of Guru Lalone Shaw.

programme.title: Petter Solberg
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Gymkhana Grid Profiles S1 - "Petter Solberg"
programme.desc: 2-time WRX champion Petter Solberg gives a master class in drift driving. Defending his first Gymkhana Grid win, Petter is force to up his game.

programme.title: Nicolett Szanto
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Gymkhana Grid Profiles S1 - "Nicolett Szanto"
programme.desc: Hungarian Gymkhana Champion Nikolett Szanto is one of the sport’s few professional drivers. Balancing racing career with her day job is just one of the many.

programme.title: Blood, Sweat and Gears
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "Blood, Sweat and Gears"
programme.desc: Handsome Jay Callaways racing career is on the line in one of the toughest technical East Coast race of the series.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 King of the Hammers: The Ultra4 Saga S1 - "The Outsider"
programme.desc: Wayland Campbell and Levi Shirley go head to head leading to the championship but there is an outsider Randy Slawson, 2 time champion to never under-estimate.

programme.title: Big Wave World Tour
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Big Wave World Tour"
programme.desc: Trevor Carlson puts everything on the line to chase monster waves from Maui, Hawaii to Ensenada, Mexico.

programme.title: WILD BOAR IN HEREKINO
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "WILD BOAR IN HEREKINO"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri is in Herekino where he meets local characters, brothers, Chad and Theo who take him on an epic pig hunting adventure.

programme.title: DIVING FOR KINA AT RANGIPUTA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "DIVING FOR KINA AT RANGIPUTA"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri Weeps heads North to Rangiputa. Guided by locals Wikatana and Sandy, the trio hit the water for a kina dive. Plus Piri gains some insight on a rahui established in Ahipara.

programme.title: Cape Verde
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Cape Verde"
programme.desc: An expat fisherman scores a big catch in Cape Verde, while another struggles in Spain. A French BandB receives its first review, and a boutique hotel launches a wedding business.

programme.title: Boutique Wedding
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Boutique Wedding"
programme.desc: Steve and his mother-in-law serve food at their Spanish bar. Ray and Yvonne host a wedding at their hotel. Two ex-actors try to bring drama to Bordeaux amid a new baby’s arrival.

programme.title: Rose Garden
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Rose Garden"
programme.desc: Mike’s couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto and Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, and want to start a family of their own.

programme.title: Smart Investment
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Smart Investment"
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez’s couple is looking for and these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations.

programme.title: BARCELONA and BERLIN
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Travel in Style S1 - "BARCELONA and BERLIN"
programme.desc: Barcelona, an architectural delight, with real European Style. If you’re looking for an alternative to sun, sea and sand then the urban city of Berlin is the perfect travel destination for you!

programme.title: Miami
programme.desc: James Lance gets to grips with his Colombian roots while trying to build a career as a Latin hip hop artist. After raising himself as a teenager, he refuses to give up and dreams of a better future.

programme.title: The First Wall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "The First Wall"
programme.desc: Ash’s journey along the Great Wall of China begins at the furthest point to the East, at an ancient section known as the Chu Great Wall. After that, Ash heads to the Shaolin Temple in Dengfeng City, to learn some of their ancient practices.

programme.title: Underwater
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Underwater"
programme.desc: Starting at Old Dragon’s Head, Ash continues west to meet a Wall Protector who has dedicated his life to preserving this iconic monument, before gearing up for an unexpected adventure: scuba diving the ruins of the Great Wall of China.

programme.title: Extreme Homes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Australias Amazing Homes S1 - "Extreme Homes"
programme.desc: Australia is an enormous continent and it has profound variations in climate. Johanna and Pete find Australian designers who have responded to the radical climate by producing some very extreme architecture.

programme.title: Fishermans Dream
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Fishermans Dream"
programme.desc: Bed and breakfast owners receive feedback from their final guests of the season. Will weddings make or break a Spanish BandB, and can the Costa’s newest fisherman make his dream a reality?

programme.title: Dive into Marbella
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Dive into Marbella"
programme.desc: Can a family from North Yorkshire run a business in the middle of Europe’s only desert? A car enthusiast pushes to sell spares in France. Two expats launch a dive centre in Marbella.

programme.title: Mediterranean Scuba
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Mediterranean Scuba"
programme.desc: A British family faces local resistance while opening a business in the Spanish desert. Scuba divers search for a century-old wreck. A French townhouse begins its transformation.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Bucket List"
programme.desc: Mike’s friend invites him to an Indian wedding and tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. This client is looking for an investment property and a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Right Choice
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Right Choice"
programme.desc: Daryl and Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found and Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl’s client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land and nature.

programme.title: Big City Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent S1 - "Big City Home"
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil and has always wanted to skydive with her clients.

programme.title: Bali
programme.desc: The Luxe Travels season starts off in the beautiful and highly popular tourism hotspot; Bali. The host, Liesel Hlista embarks on a mission to understand how the Balinese blend hospitality with luxury.

programme.title: Ireland
programme.desc: An uncommon destination for a series that explores exotic tropical getaways. But this island nation has some of the most evocative landscapes that mother nature has to offer!

programme.title: Jamaica
programme.desc: Easy island vibes, lots of amazing local rum, brilliant natural landscapes and those amazing beaches! Of course,Luxe Travels is in Jamaica! But in this episode, host Liesel Hlista shows you a different side of the Irie nation; away from the hordes of people unleashed via cruise liners!

programme.title: Underwater
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Underwater"
programme.desc: Starting at Old Dragon’s Head, Ash continues west to meet a Wall Protector who has dedicated his life to preserving this iconic monument, before gearing up for an unexpected adventure: scuba diving the ruins of the Great Wall of China.

programme.title: Beijing and beyond
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Beijing and beyond"
programme.desc: Ash has made it to Beijing, where he’s meeting Terry Townsend to learn more about wildlife conservation in the region around the Great Wall of China. He also meets two more Wall Protectors and samples local delicacies in Shi Xia Village.

programme.title: Eagles Neck
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Great Wall with Ash Dykes S1 - "Eagles Neck"
programme.desc: In his toughest challenge so far, Ash takes on Eagle’s Neck – a notoriously steep and dangerous section of the Great Wall of China. But first, he meets tech experts who’ve been helping to digitally map The Great Wall in an effort to protect it.

programme.title: Seattle
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Seattle"
programme.desc: Denella visits the Emerald City, Seattle. This gateway city is known for its award winning airport and cruise port.

programme.title: Incredible Conversions
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Australias Amazing Homes S1 - "Incredible Conversions"
programme.desc: Converting old buildings like warehouses and churches into modern homes is not for the faint hearted. Discover some truly amazing conversions that manage to successfully combine modern design without elminating the original charm of the old buildings - and the results are spectacular.

programme.title: Jasmines Favourite
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent S7 - "Jasmines Favourite"
programme.desc: Alan and Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help! Alan and Amber are not only looking for a home in Canada, but also, a place abroad in Thailand.

programme.title: Living and Golf
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent S7 - "Living and Golf"
programme.desc: Rick is looking for an investment property in either Canada or abroad. Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri shows Rick an incredible opportunity in Caledon while Real Estate Agent Mike Donia shows Rick an equally incredible opportunity in Panama.

programme.title: Charente
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Charente"
programme.desc: The couple swap Chelmsford for Charente, but can they open their self-catering complex before summer starts? A seafood restaurant builds a reputation amid tough competition. Londoners host a traditional tea party at their BandB.

programme.title: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: Discover unknown corners of the world in our new show Beyond Borders! Join our dynamic duo for an unforgettable journey filled with adventures, culture, and breathtaking views.

programme.title: Puerto Rico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Luxe Travels S1 - "Puerto Rico"
programme.desc: Liesel explores all the hands-on activities such as riding horseback on the beach, riding ATV’s through the muddy swamps, and hiking through the super lush El Yunque rainforest. Luxurious resorts are only a stones throw away - hopping islands, Liesel gets to experience the ultra modern and chic El Blok located in Vieques. Between stays at all the luxury boutique resorts, a common trend starts to appear, and that is the island’s cuisine.

programme.title: Incredible Conversions
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Australias Amazing Homes S1 - "Incredible Conversions"
programme.desc: Converting old buildings like warehouses and churches into modern homes is not for the faint hearted. Discover some truly amazing conversions that manage to successfully combine modern design without elminating the original charm of the old buildings - and the results are spectacular.

programme.title: Jasmines Favourite
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent S7 - "Jasmines Favourite"
programme.desc: Alan and Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help! Alan and Amber are not only looking for a home in Canada, but also, a place abroad in Thailand.

programme.title: Living and Golf
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent S7 - "Living and Golf"
programme.desc: Rick is looking for an investment property in either Canada or abroad. Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri shows Rick an incredible opportunity in Caledon while Real Estate Agent Mike Donia shows Rick an equally incredible opportunity in Panama.

programme.title: Charente
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A New Life in the Sun S1 - "Charente"
programme.desc: The couple swap Chelmsford for Charente, but can they open their self-catering complex before summer starts? A seafood restaurant builds a reputation amid tough competition. Londoners host a traditional tea party at their BandB.

programme.title: French Polynesia Part 1
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Maximum Foodie S3 - "French Polynesia Part 1"
programme.desc: Sashi is in a strip of islands in the middle of nowhere - French Polynesia! He scours the island of Bora Bora in search of a real local’s meal but goes empty handed. Switching gears, he looks for respite at the legendary Four Seasons Bora Bora where he embarks on a deep-sea fishing run with local fishermen, catching yellowtail tuna.

programme.title: French Polynesia Part 2
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Maximum Foodie S3 - "French Polynesia Part 2"
programme.desc: With luxury done and dusted, Sashi comes across a story of resurgence during a pandemic, with the story of St. James, one of the island’s newest restaurants. Feeling like he did Bora Bora justice, Sashi island hops over to Mo’orea where he takes the quirkiest food tour of his life; baguettes with chow mein, ice-cream pizza, Chinese dumplings!? The island of Mo’orea does quirky food right!

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Ibiza"
programme.desc: Three artists head to Ibiza to face their street art challenge; bringing the local community together through art. But the Mediterranean sun is unforgiving.

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: Two street artists team up in downtown Hong Kong to hear their street art challenge; create awareness for the citys fast growing food waste problem.

programme.title: Milan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 A Simple Path S2 - "Milan"
programme.desc: 120 Hours in Milan where dreams come true. Connect at Rufus Skate and textured expressions. The global community at Milano Centrale. Candy Coast, try and try again for creative escape. Flying at Lambrate Skate Park, photographic genius and unity.

programme.title: Riding Waves in Stilbaai
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Riding Waves in Stilbaai"
programme.desc: In Stilbaai, Xander and his crew partake in a peaceful shammanic practice before embarking on an intimidating adventure. Back in Canada, Adam learns a lesson about moderation.

programme.title: Tokyo
programme.desc: Local Exploring in Tokyo is like nothing else. Josh and Lexi Limitless visit the crowded streets, a screaming Monster Cafe and an abandoned ‘Love Hotel’.

programme.title: Nikko
programme.desc: Epic Exploring: Going Local is back in Japan in Nikko as Cody, reunited with Sherman Mak, explores a derelict onsen and an amusement park called Western Village.

programme.title: Deepaks Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Deepaks Italy"
programme.desc: The trio experience gladiator combat, drive classic cars through the countryside, and learn winemaking in Barolo. The adventure also includes motocross thrills, blending history, culture, and excitement throughout northern Italy.

programme.title: Ashiques Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Ashiques Italy"
programme.desc: Ashique surprises the team with Vespa rides along the coast, adapts plans with an aquarium visit, and arranges a Fiat 500 countryside drive. The day ends with relaxation at a Roman spa.

programme.title: Inside Ferrari
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Inside Ferrari"
programme.desc: The trio are joined by Mathias Lauda, son of F1 Legend Niki Lauda, at Ferrari’s Maranello HQ. From factory tours showcasing Ferrari’s craftsmanship to dining in Ferrari’s historic restaurant, the team immerses in Ferrari’s legacy.

programme.title: Wildest Swimming
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Wildest Swimming"
programme.desc: Chris shares his wildest swimming adventures, from swimming with hump back whales, to racing with wild dolphins!

programme.title: Mothers Day
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Mothers Day"
programme.desc: It’s Mother’s Day. But with adventures ranging from trapeze walking to jetpack flying, it might not be quite what you’d expect.

programme.title: Coober Pedy
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Coober Pedy"
programme.desc: Chris is going underground; from the caves of Coober Pedy to accommodation with a difference in the Blue mountains.

programme.title: TROUT FISHING THE TONGARIRO
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "TROUT FISHING THE TONGARIRO"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri heads to Turangi to go fly fishing on upper reaches of the Tongariro River only accessible by white water rafting.

programme.title: KINA CREW
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "KINA CREW"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri is in Wellington with his dive team, the ‘Kina Crew’. The boys hit the west and southern coastlines to collect kai moana ahead of their annual ‘AGM’.

programme.title: WILD RAM + WEKA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Piri’s Tiki Tour S1 - "WILD RAM + WEKA"
programme.desc: In this episode, Piri is in the Chatham Islands hunting wild ram and weka with one of the locals known as Big Jase.

programme.title: Naples
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Access All Areas S1 - "Naples"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando is on a quest to discover the truth behind the city of Naples, is it a kingdom of violence and a culture obsessed with death?

programme.title: Edinburgh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Access All Areas S1 - "Edinburgh"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando uncovers Edinburghs gruesome past, back when grave robbing, bodysnatching and murder were rife.

programme.title: Cornwall
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Access All Areas S1 - "Cornwall"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando dives into life in Cornwall to discover the ancient practices of witchcraft and smuggling.

programme.title: The Best of…
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Around the World in 80 Tricks S1 - "The Best of…"
programme.desc: In the episode you can see the best of Around the World in 80 Tricks.

programme.title: Jamaica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Running the World S1 - "Jamaica"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a unique run in an unusal setting on the Island of Jamaica.

programme.title: Best of ep. 7 to 11
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 7 to 11"
programme.desc: In this episode the boys look back over their time spent in Portugal India Mexico Gran Canaria and Jamaica.

programme.title: Inside Ferrari 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Car and Country Quest - 30 Min Version S1 - "Inside Ferrari 2"
programme.desc: Freddie leads an exclusive Ferrari tour, as they explore Ferrari’s design centre, visit its museum, and honour F1 champions. A friendly race in the Ferrari simulator and a scenic drive in new Ferraris close their Italian adventure beautifully.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Valentines Day"
programme.desc: Chris helps a friend arrange a romantic Valentines Day for his partner and gives viewers the run down of his top five most romantic Australian beaches.

programme.title: Melbourne
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Melbourne"
programme.desc: Chris visits Melbourne for a series of challenges that celebrate the city’s food, football and street art culture.

programme.title: Darwin Beer Can Regatta
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Darwin Beer Can Regatta"
programme.desc: Chris meets crocodiles, flies in a float planes and takes part in the famous Darwin Beer Can Regatta, all in Australia’s iconic Top End.

programme.title: U.S.A. / Belgium
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Epic Exploring S1 - "U.S.A. / Belgium"
programme.desc: While Cody explores lost industries in the ‘ugliest’ city in the world with freerunner Abudi Alsagoff, Josh, together with his old neighborhood friend John Yurei, is in the famous American prison Joliet, where prisoners build their own cells.

programme.title: Kapiti
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 Piri’s Tiki Tour S5 - "Kapiti"
programme.desc: On the Kapiti Coast, Piri and keen fisherman, Jason Huria, target snapper and tarakihi. Piri jumps on a twin hulled waka with Te Wera Henare to sail out to Kapiti island.

programme.title: Tūranga-nui-a-Kiwa
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Piri’s Tiki Tour S6 - "Tūranga-nui-a-Kiwa"
programme.desc: Piri and ex Crusader Tu Umaga-Marshall are in Tūranga-nui-a-Kiwa (Gisborne), diving for Haku (Kingfish), boxing with the Patu Tahi Boxing Club and meeting Gisborne’s local horse whisperer Sam Sidney.

programme.title: Te Urewera
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Piri’s Tiki Tour S6 - "Te Urewera"
programme.desc: Piri and ex Warrior Wairangi Koopu are deep in Te Urewera. Hosted by Waimana’s local all female hunting group the “Wahine Slayaz”, they hunt Deer, gather Oysters and make Rongoā with Koro Hori Hillman.

programme.title: Taupō
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Piri’s Tiki Tour S6 - "Taupō"
programme.desc: Piri and ex Crusader Tu Umaga-Marshall are in Taupō, on the lake targeting Trout, having a run around with the Taupō Juniors Touch Team and learning some Taupō Hītori from Piri’s high school mate Awhina Eru.

programme.title: Iceland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Access All Areas S1 - "Iceland"
programme.desc: Francesca is on a quest to discover why Icelandic people believe in mythical creatures. Is it folk law or are there really trolls lurking in the wilderness?

programme.title: Snowdonia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Access All Areas S1 - "Snowdonia"
programme.desc: Francesca Chiorando goes on a high-octane, nail-biting adventure in Snowdonia, one of the remotest corners of the UK.

programme.title: Alaska
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Traveling with Denella S4 - "Alaska"
programme.desc: Denella visits Anchorage, Alaska, where its a bit urban and wild.

programme.title: Houston
programme.desc: Jamie Hancock was raised in Houston’s South Park area, a place notorious for gang violence, but also where hip hop artists created a new sound. Today, a new positive message is being created by people like Jamie through music.

programme.title: Kapiti
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 Piri’s Tiki Tour S5 - "Kapiti"
programme.desc: On the Kapiti Coast, Piri and keen fisherman, Jason Huria, target snapper and tarakihi. Piri jumps on a twin hulled waka with Te Wera Henare to sail out to Kapiti island.

programme.title: Tūranga-nui-a-Kiwa
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Piri’s Tiki Tour S6 - "Tūranga-nui-a-Kiwa"
programme.desc: Piri and ex Crusader Tu Umaga-Marshall are in Tūranga-nui-a-Kiwa (Gisborne), diving for Haku (Kingfish), boxing with the Patu Tahi Boxing Club and meeting Gisborne’s local horse whisperer Sam Sidney.

programme.title: Te Urewera
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Piri’s Tiki Tour S6 - "Te Urewera"
programme.desc: Piri and ex Warrior Wairangi Koopu are deep in Te Urewera. Hosted by Waimana’s local all female hunting group the “Wahine Slayaz”, they hunt Deer, gather Oysters and make Rongoā with Koro Hori Hillman.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivoksesta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: 20 tonnia painavan lohkareen kuljettaminen kaivokselta lahtevalla petollisella tiella osoittautuu liian raskaaksi heidan vanhalle kuorma-autolleen Six packille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Elokuun hurjan lumimyrskyn takia Claudian ja Robinin on pakko jaada 2 Mileen, kun taas Gary ja Garon yrittavat pelastaa tilanteen ajamalla myrskyn lapi ja tuomalla heille tarvikkeita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin tekee vaikean paatoksen rakkaan kaivosautonsa Six packin suhteen toisen kalliiksi tulleen rikkoutumisen jalkeen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa Claudia ajaa uupuneen miehistonsa murtumispisteeseen, mika saa kiihkon leimahtamaan ja pakottaa Claudian viimein hyvaksymaan tappionsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Uusi kaivoskausi on taynna ikavia yllatyksia, mutta epatodennakoinen tapahtuma pelastaa tilanteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh on kyllastynyt tyoskentelemaan isalleen, joten han perustaa oman kuorma-autoyrityksensa uudella rekalla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Armeijan kuorma-auto hajoaa julmalla tiella kaivokselle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Gary ja poikansa pelastavat vanhan armeijan kuorma-auton, mutta sen ajaminen kaivokselle on raakaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Garon ja Josh menettavat Six packin hallinnan mutaisilla teilla.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Justin lentaa paikalle uuden vaijerisahan kanssa, mutta menettaa malttinsa yrittaessaan asentaa sita.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto kohtaa loputtomasti ongelmia yrittaessaan leikata palan 18 metrin pituisesta linssista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia tuo paikalle ison porauskaluston, ja hanella on vain nelja paivaa aikaa loytaa paras jadepaikka, mutta han ja Robin eivat osaa paattaa, mista etsia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehet ottavat yhteen, kun he loppukauden kiireet pakottavat heidat tyoskentelemaan kahdessa kaivoksessa yhta aikaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto irrottaa jadelohkareita J-linssista, mutta iso ongelma tiella uhkaa kaikkea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Claudia ja Robini etsivat jadea poraamalla tuloksetta, edes yhtion geologit eivat paase yksimielisyyteen suunnitelmasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada raskaan kaluston vuorelle ennen kuin tulvivat joet katkaisevat paasyn kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Ilmassa on jannitetta, kun miehisto yrittaa saada raskasta kalustoa mutaiselle, lohkareiden peittamalle 120 kilometrin pituiselle polulle perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksen vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa saada koneensa kulkemaan vyoryvien jokien yli perustaakseen uuden jadekaivoksensa vuorenhuipulle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan on vakuuttunut siita, etta Dynastyn alueella veden tayttaman kuopan alla on jadea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Robin yrittaa uhmata fysiikan lakeja saadakseen massiivisen uuden kasarmin Wolverinen alueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn porukkaa koettelee huono onni, ja jokainen keksii ainutlaatuisia ratkaisuja huonon onnen karkottamiseksi.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmates flirting calms a jailhouse fight. An inebriated man tries to avoid his eighth DUI by claiming his car was stolen, and a disagreement over Faecbook puts a couple in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman lies hobbled in the backseat of a patrol car after kicking the officer in the face. Officers struggle to control an outrageous man. Officers attend to a woman struck by a drunk driver.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman booked for domestic violence begins screaming and can’t calm down. Two friends arrested for public intoxication embrace in a tearful reunion. Later, a woman is brought in with a stolen car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man under the influence states money will buy his freedom after threatening police with a gun. Individuals arrested for possession blame each other. A man arrested for drunk driving becomes unruly.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A trustee finds himself in hot water after officers discover his contraband stash. A disgruntled oil worker doesn’t think the charge fits the crime after stealing two hedge trimmers. Conflicting accounts arise when an officer and a stylish inmate butt heads in booking. A woman learns to put herself first after failed attempts to help her boyfriend’s addiction land her in prison.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After cutting her head, a woman bites and kicks deputies. To investigate potential hidden meanings, a man’s tattoos are examined. A confused man is found with illegal mushrooms at a bus stop.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why hes been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.

programme.title: Jail
