programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: Kesaprinssi
programme.desc: PR-kriisinhallitsija Deidre ja hanen assistenttinsa Mandy lentavat apuun, kun kapinallinen kuninkaallinen, prinssi Colin, pidatetaan idaholaisessa pikkukaupungissa. Deidren selvitellessa omaa fiaskoaan Mandy huomaa odottamattomia ura- ja romanssimahdollisuuksia.

programme.title: The Right Kind of Wrong
programme.desc: Leo Palamino on epaonnistunut kirjailija, josta tuli tiskaaja. Nyt hanet tunnetaan ex-vaimon pitamasta blogista “Miksi olet paska”, josta on tullut suuri hitti. Sitten Leo tapaa Coletten, unelmiensa naisen… paivana, jona Colette on menossa naimisiin taydellisen miehen kanssa.Peloton haaveilija Leo panee kaiken peliin nayttaakseen Colettelle ja maailmalle, mita kaikkea hyvaa on miehessa, joka tunnetaan vain huonoista puolistaan.

programme.title: Joulukievari
programme.desc: Kun liikenainen Jennifer kuulee vanhempiensa lahtevan matkoille jouluksi ilman hanta, han paattaa jattaa San Franciscon humun taakseen ja lahtea Alaskaan tutustumaan isoaidiltaan perinnoksi saamaansa kievarrin, joka on tarkoitus kunnostaa ja myyda.

programme.title: Lahetys joulua
programme.desc: Kun hanen lahetyskumppaninsa paattaa lahtea Amerikan suosikkiaamuohjelmasta, Veronika Daniels ilmoittaa valitsevansa uuden juontajakansa kourallisen ehdokkaiden joukosta, joihin kuuluu paikallinen New Yorkin uutislahettaja Charlie Fisher.

programme.title: Bottled with Love
programme.desc: Abbey on onneton, turhautunut ja melkein toivosta luopunut uranainen, koska deittailu ei ota sujuakseen. Isoaiti ehdottaa, etta Abbey kirjoittaisi kaikki toiveensa rakkauskirjeeksi suoraan sydamestaan. Abbey noudattaa neuvoa vastahakoisesti, panee kirjeen pulloon ja heittaa sen mereen. Aika kuluu, ja kuukausia myohemmin Abbey aloittaa projektin pomonsa pojan Nickin kanssa. Nick on sattumalta loytanyt pullopostin tietamatta, etta se on Abbeyn. Mutta vahitellen han tajuaa yhdistaa kirjeen Abbeyyn. Tilanne ja salaisuus kayvat hyvin kiusalliseksi ja Nick paattaa kertoa kirjeesta. Koska Nick on salannut asiaa pitkaan, Abbey kaskee hanta painumaan hemmettiin. Mutta Nick ei vahasta saikahda.

programme.title: Love and Honor
programme.desc: Kun nuori sotilas Vietnamissa joutuu kotikaupungin tyton kaatamaan, han ja hanen paras ystavansa paattavat menna AWOLiin ja palata osavaltioihin voittaakseen hanet takaisin.

programme.title: Who Gets The Dog
programme.desc: Olive (Alicia Silverstone) ja Clay (Ryan Kwanten) rakastuivat ensisilmayksella, menivat naimisiin, ostivat asunnon ja adoptoivat koiranpennun nimelta Wesley. Kuusi vuotta myohemmin he ovat paattaneet erota, ja kumpikin haluaa ottaa rakastetun Wesley-koiran mukaansa. Asiasta ei paasta yksimielisyyteen, ja huoltajuuskiista etenee oikeuteen. Oikeus maaraa 60 paivan seurantajakson, jonka aikana tutkitaan kumpi on parempi huoltaja. Molemmat haluavat voittaa – keinoilla milla hyvansa.

programme.title: No Stranger Than Love
programme.desc: Kaikki kylan miehen ovat rakastuneet Lucyyn. Han on kiltti, sympaattinen, hauska ja lojaali – taydellinen nainen, joka ei tee mitaan vaarin. Mutta nyt han on suostunut romanttiseen tapaamiseen koulun jalkapallojoukkueen naimisissa olevan valmentajan Clintin kanssa. Juuri kun he ovat aloittamassa suhdettaan Clint putoaa aukkoon, joka ilmestyy Lucyn olohuoneen lattiaan. Se ei olekaan mika hyvansa kuoppa, vaan loputon musta aukko, missa Clint kelluu kuin eri ulottuvuudessa.Lucyn taytyy yrittaa pelastaa Clint paljastamatta heidan salaista suhdettaan ja vahemman taydellista puoltaan koko kylalle.

programme.title: All For Her
programme.desc: Devina ja hanen miehensa Rick kaipaavat lasta. Monien keskenmenojen jalkeen Devina tulee lopulta raskaaksi. Mutta kun selviaa, etta han on vakavasti sairas, alkaa taistelu aikaa vastaan. Devinan on pysyttava hengissa lapsen syntymaan asti…

programme.title: Jouluhaat
programme.desc: Haley Foster pakeni lapsuutensa pikkukaupungista Pineridgesta ja siirtyi suurkaupunkilaiselamaan losangelesilaisena haajarjestelijana rva Reynoldsin omistamassa eliittiluokan yrityksessa.

programme.title: Intersection
programme.desc: Keskella Marokon autiomaata tapahtuu tuhoisa auto-onnettomuus. Mukana ovat haamatkaansa viettava aviopari, tuoreen vaimon salainen rakastaja, vankilaan matkalla oleva timanttisalakuljettaja saattajansa kanssa seka arvoituksellinen nainen sylissaan pieni vauva. Miten kaikkien tarinat ja menneisyys kuroutuvat lopulta yhteen ja pystyvatko he luottamaan toisiinsa selvitakseen pois aavikolta ennen kuin on liian myohaista vai saapuuko pelastus tuntemattoman miehen lahestyessa horisontissa...

programme.title: Below Her Mouth
programme.desc: Dallas (Erika Linder) on vasynyt kuvioihinsa. Han raataa paivat katontekijana ja tapaa rakastajattaria oisin – paivasta toiseen. Kunnes han tapaa itsevarman ja menestyneen muotitoimittajan Jasminen eraalla klubilla. He tuntevat vetoa toisiinsa heti ensi katseesta ja heittaytyvat intohimoiseen suhteeseen. Jasmine nakee Dallasin mielistelevan charmin lapi ja Dallas nakee Jasminen kaipuun olla oma itsensa. On vain pieni ongelma, Jasminen sulhanen Rile. Below Her Mouth on uskallettu ja hehkuva draama, joka on tehty naisvoimin, ohjaajasta kuvaajaan ja skriptaan. Yhdessa paaosista naemme ruotsalaisen nayttelijan ja mallin Erika Linderin.

programme.title: Rakkaus Loytaa Savelen
programme.desc: Evie Decker (Lili Taylor) on ujo nuori nainen, joka tienaa leipansa pupuna parhaat paivansa nahneessa huvipuistossa. Kaikki muuttuu, kun han rakastuu laulaja Drumstrings Caseyn aaneen radiossa ja alkaa kayda kaverin keikoilla. Voiko kahden taysin erilaisen maailman kohtaamisesta loytya yhteinen savel ja tulevaisuus?

programme.title: Some Girls
programme.desc: Juuri ennen haitaan menestyva kirjailija (Adam Brody) matkustelee ympari maata tapaamassa entisia tyttoystaviaan (Jennifer Morrison, Mía Maestro, Emily Watson, Zoe Kazan ja Kristen Bell) hyvittaakseen tekemansa vaaryydet.

programme.title: Ohjelmat jatkuvat pian
programme.desc: Olemme pienilla kauneusunilla! Katso lisaa Rakuten TV:n tarjoamaa ilmaisviihdetta.

programme.title: You and Me
programme.desc: Nuori kuuro nainen tapaa vastikaan sokeutuneen miehen, ja tasta kohtaamisesta saa alkunsa hauska ja koskettava rakkaustarina elaman suurista haasteista ja ilon hetkista.

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

programme.title: All For Her
programme.desc: Devina ja hanen miehensa Rick kaipaavat lasta. Monien keskenmenojen jalkeen Devina tulee lopulta raskaaksi. Mutta kun selviaa, etta han on vakavasti sairas, alkaa taistelu aikaa vastaan. Devinan on pysyttava hengissa lapsen syntymaan asti…

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Entinen kokkilupaus Charlie on nyt innoton parikymppinen, joka asuu aitinsa ja isapuolensa luona. Hanen elamansa saa yllattavan kaanteen, kun han rakastuu baristaan Amberiin.

programme.title: Leading Lady
programme.desc: Nayttelija ja opettaja Jodi Rutherford lahtee etsimaan seka inspiraatiota etta itseaan lomamatkalta Etela-Afrikkaan. Han saa suostuteltua paikallisen maanviljelija Kobuksen auttamaan hanta valmistutumaan uuteen rooliinsa, mutta joutuu vastapalveluksena osallistumaan taman perheen maatilan naytelman tuottamiseen. Eika aikaakaan, kun Jodi huomaa hurmaantuneensa seka paikallisten ystavallisyydesta etta Kobuksen itsepaisyydesta enemman kuin uskaltaisi edes myontaa…

programme.title: Albert Nobbs
programme.desc: Albert Nobbs kertoo koskettavan tarinan 1800-luvun lopun Irlannissa, missa koyhan naisen elama on mahdotonta ilman elattajaa. Vuosikaudet Albert Nobbs on selvinnyt pukeutumalla mieheksi voidakseen tyoskennella hovimestarina Dublinin ylaluokan hotellissa. Tavatessaan hotelliin saapuvan komean maalarin, Albert havaitsee etta elama voi tarjota mahdollisuuksia myos hanen kaltaiselleen.

programme.title: Who Gets The Dog
programme.desc: Olive (Alicia Silverstone) ja Clay (Ryan Kwanten) rakastuivat ensisilmayksella, menivat naimisiin, ostivat asunnon ja adoptoivat koiranpennun nimelta Wesley. Kuusi vuotta myohemmin he ovat paattaneet erota, ja kumpikin haluaa ottaa rakastetun Wesley-koiran mukaansa. Asiasta ei paasta yksimielisyyteen, ja huoltajuuskiista etenee oikeuteen. Oikeus maaraa 60 paivan seurantajakson, jonka aikana tutkitaan kumpi on parempi huoltaja. Molemmat haluavat voittaa – keinoilla milla hyvansa.

programme.title: Kirjava huntu (The Painted Veil)
programme.desc: Laakari Walter Fane ja hanen vaimonsa Kitty ovat komennuksella Shanghaissa, jossa Walter on toissa paikallisessa sairaalassa. Walterin vaativa tyo vie kaiken liikenevan ajan ja yksinainen Kitty ajautuu englantilaisen diplomaatin Charles Townsendin syleilyyn. Kun Walter saa tietaa vaimonsa uskottomuudesta, han janoaa kostoa. Walter hyvaksyy vaarallisen tyon kiinalaisessa pikkukylassa, jossa riehuu kuolettava koleraepidemia. Kittylla ei ole muuta mahdollisuutta kuin seurata miestaan maaseudulle kauas kaikesta.

programme.title: Bottled with Love
programme.desc: Abbey on onneton, turhautunut ja melkein toivosta luopunut uranainen, koska deittailu ei ota sujuakseen. Isoaiti ehdottaa, etta Abbey kirjoittaisi kaikki toiveensa rakkauskirjeeksi suoraan sydamestaan. Abbey noudattaa neuvoa vastahakoisesti, panee kirjeen pulloon ja heittaa sen mereen. Aika kuluu, ja kuukausia myohemmin Abbey aloittaa projektin pomonsa pojan Nickin kanssa. Nick on sattumalta loytanyt pullopostin tietamatta, etta se on Abbeyn. Mutta vahitellen han tajuaa yhdistaa kirjeen Abbeyyn. Tilanne ja salaisuus kayvat hyvin kiusalliseksi ja Nick paattaa kertoa kirjeesta. Koska Nick on salannut asiaa pitkaan, Abbey kaskee hanta painumaan hemmettiin. Mutta Nick ei vahasta saikahda.

programme.title: The Death Of Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: Charlie Countrymanin (LaBeouf) hyvin tavallinen elama saa uuden suunnan kun han kummallisten sattumusten kautta rakastuu romanialaiseen kaunottareen Gabiin (Wood). Yhdessaolon esteeksi nousee kuitenkin Gabin tummanpuhuva menneisyys ja yltiovakivaltainen aviomies, rikollispomo Nigel (Mikkelsen). Charliella on vain yksi vaihtoehto Gabin vapauttamiseksi: pelastaa tytto ja maksaa siita hengellaan.

programme.title: Lamant double
programme.desc: Chloella on ihana terapeuttimies Louis, mutta myos kipera ongelma. Miehen identtinen kaksoisveli Paul on kiinnostunut Chloesta seka eroottisesti etta psykoanalyysin kohteena. Miellyttava empaatikko Louis ja jaatava manipuloija Paul eivat ole koskaan samassa paikassa, mutta jo seksikohtausten lihallisuus vakuuttaa katsojalle, ettei dilemma ole vain Chloen paassa.

programme.title: Date and Switch
programme.desc: Abit Michael ja Matty ovat olleet parhaita ystavia kolmannelta luokalta saakka. He ovat yha neitsyita ja tekevat sopimuksen, etta auttavat toisiaan saamaan seksia ennen abitansseja – mutta heidan missionsa saa yllattavan kaanteen, kun Matt ilmoittaa olevansa homo.

programme.title: They Came Together
programme.desc: Joelin (Paul Rudd) ja Mollyn (Amy Poehler) tapaaminen on vihaa ensisilmayksella: Joelin iso Corporate Candy Company uhkaa tehdan lopun Amyn omalaatuisesta karkkikaupasta. Lisaksi Joel haikailee edelleen seksikkaan exansa (Cobie Smulders) peraan. Kumma kylla he rakastuvat vain erotakseen elokuvan loppupuolella. Molly alkaa tapailla kirjanpitajaansa (Ed Helms). Mutta aivan loppuhetkilla...noh, sinun taytyy nahda se itse. (Vinkki: Joel pitaa suuren puheen ja he palaavat yhteen.) Railakas ja epakunnoittava, kumouksellinen romanttinen komedia Wet Hot American Summerin, Wanderlustin ja Role Modelsin ohjaajalta.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: This week Dermot tackles a large Victorian terraced house in the highly sought-after Dublin suburb of Donnybrook.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: The first in the season will see Catherine Bennett and her youngest daughter Sarah Jane keen to downsize from their huge 13-bedroomed house in Mullingar. Theyre planning to move down the road, where they also own a 3-bed bungalow thats been uninhabited for the last nine years.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot faces a unique challenge in Clane, Co. Kildare.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon helps Senator Katherine Zappone and Dr Ann Louise Gilligan renovate a dilapidated hunting lodge in Brittas, Dublin.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Desperate for more space, a couple with two young daughters, who have long since outgrown their tiny cottage in Killawalla outside Westport, engage Dermot to help.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot revamps a Rathfarnham four-bed to suit the changing needs of its occupants Peter, Lisa and their twins Grace and Louise (9) live in a four-bed house in Rathfarnham, Dublin 14.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: A young couple with three children seek Dermots help in revamping their small three bedroomed bungalow in Ballinteer Ailish and Patrick Bates are a young couple running out of space - fast!

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot knows exactly how to solve the problem but it means destroying a lot of the work the couple have already done.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts are up against the clock to revamp their 70s bungalow in Enniskerry before their first baby arrives.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot needs to create "a bungalow downstairs" incorporating a bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living and dining room.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is normally confident about presenting a plan. But with a couple as design-literate as Greg and Siobhan, the stakes are that bit higher.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot is in Rathcoole with Mary Moore, the design solution Dermot offers Mary is one of the most unusual and interesting he has ever conceived.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Architect Dermot Bannon sets out to transform peoples living spaces. Before moving in to their 1940s ex-council house in Co Kilkenny, the Kirwans added a basic extension.

programme.title: Room to Improve
programme.desc: Dermot wants to turn the house completely on its head, putting the bedrooms to the front and extending the back to include a kitchen, living and dining that leads into the garden.

programme.title: Room to Improve

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - Stubborn Pioneer
programme.desc: Mr. Carpenter goes into the wilderness to start a new settlement called Carpenterville. Hawkeye has his suspicions about the Mohawk guide who is leading them.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: John Blair buys a worthless stage line to a ghost town, then races to win a mail contract. Early John Wayne Western blending action, grit, and frontier determination in under an hour.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Cimarron Strip - The Battle Of Bloody Stones
programme.desc: When a young Indian is killed after challenging the accuracy of a battle depicted in a show, Crown must prevent the young mans father, from avenging his sons death upon the star of the show.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Naked Hills
programme.desc: An Indiana farmer seeks fortune in the 1849 Gold Rush. After years of adventure and absence, he returns home twice, only to find his family’s warmth fading with each departure.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Promised Valley
programme.desc: Conflict arises among the Tuscarawas when a brave tries to persuade the tribal council that Chief Tawenduma is a thief.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Gods Gun
programme.desc: Ben Haenni (Jack Palance) is the leader of the Clayton gang, he kills Father John so he can seed chaos in Juno City. An orphan boy (Leif Garrett) seeks out Father Johns twin brother (Lee Van Cleef), a retired bounty hunter, to come back with him and save the town.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Girl
programme.desc: A Seneca chief teams up with an unscrupulous young woman to try to start a war between the Iroquois and some settlers.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: Owen Daybright (Burt Lancaster) feuds with his black sheep brother Lee Strobie over the rights to their fathers empire. But the sibling rivalry comes to a head when Lee fathers an illegitimate child and tries to frame Owen.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Cimarron Strip - The Hunted
programme.desc: When two outlaw brothers surrender claiming self-defense, bounty hunters close in. After one is killed, the other seeks revenge, forcing Marshal Crown to bring him to justice.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Big Trees
programme.desc: A greedy timber baron (Kirk Douglas) wants to log the giant sequoias in northern California. He plans to cheat the Quaker colony who lives on the land, but things begin to change when a new rival comes to town.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Soldier
programme.desc: A soldier is accused of stealing breech-loading rifles and selling them to the Indians. Hell be charged with treason unless the real culprit is found.

programme.desc: Conflict arises among the Tuscarawas when a brave tries to persuade the tribal council that Chief Tawenduma is a thief.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Gods Gun
programme.desc: Ben Haenni (Jack Palance) is the leader of the Clayton gang, he kills Father John so he can seed chaos in Juno City. An orphan boy (Leif Garrett) seeks out Father Johns twin brother (Lee Van Cleef), a retired bounty hunter, to come back with him and save the town.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Girl
programme.desc: A Seneca chief teams up with an unscrupulous young woman to try to start a war between the Iroquois and some settlers.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: Owen Daybright (Burt Lancaster) feuds with his black sheep brother Lee Strobie over the rights to their fathers empire. But the sibling rivalry comes to a head when Lee fathers an illegitimate child and tries to frame Owen.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Cimarron Strip - The Hunted
programme.desc: When two outlaw brothers surrender claiming self-defense, bounty hunters close in. After one is killed, the other seeks revenge, forcing Marshal Crown to bring him to justice.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Big Trees
programme.desc: A greedy timber baron (Kirk Douglas) wants to log the giant sequoias in northern California. He plans to cheat the Quaker colony who lives on the land, but things begin to change when a new rival comes to town.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans - The Soldier
programme.desc: A soldier is accused of stealing breech-loading rifles and selling them to the Indians. Hell be charged with treason unless the real culprit is found.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - Winds of the Wasteland
programme.desc: John Blair buys a worthless stage line to a ghost town, then races to win a mail contract. Early John Wayne Western blending action, grit, and frontier determination in under an hour.

programme.title: Cimarron Strip
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Cimarron Strip - The Battle Of Bloody Stones
programme.desc: When a young Indian is killed after challenging the accuracy of a battle depicted in a show, Crown must prevent the young mans father, from avenging his sons death upon the star of the show.

programme.title: Stormcast Westerns Movies - The Naked Hills
programme.desc: An Indiana farmer seeks fortune in the 1849 Gold Rush. After years of adventure and absence, he returns home twice, only to find his family’s warmth fading with each departure.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last years injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) and Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. Well see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: The Sandwich Episode
programme.desc: This is.... THE SANDWICH EPISODE, featuring "The Bear" culinary producer Courtney Storer.

programme.title: The Soup Episode
programme.desc: It’s time to get warm and fire up some soup.

programme.title: Thanksgiving Special
programme.desc: The Smoked Turkey Gravy To Cover All Your Thanksgiving Sins.

programme.title: Meat Lovers!
programme.desc: On this episode, we serve up our favorite meat-themed recipes and learn some fun food facts along the way!

programme.title: All About the Bread!
programme.desc: On this episode, we explore some of our favorite bread-themed recipes and learn some fun facts along the way!

programme.title: Dinner Party!
programme.desc: On this episode, we help you plan your next big dinner party with some of our favorite three-course recipes!

programme.title: Winter Wonderland
programme.desc: Were taking a trip through our Winter Wonderland! Toss aside those mittens... its time to cook!

programme.title: Dishes of the World!
programme.desc: On this episode, were going global with some of our favorite recipes from Europe, Asia and Africa!

programme.title: Latin Lovers... Of Food!
programme.desc: On this episode, were featuring some of our favorite Latin-inspired recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: European Adventure
programme.desc: Today, well be visiting the United Kingdom, Germany, France, and Greece to check out their culinary wonders.

programme.title: Healthy Meals!
programme.desc: On this episode, we show you how eating healthy can still be delicious with some Tastemade healthy recipes!

programme.title: Sweet and Savory!
programme.desc: On this episode, were bringing you our favorite sweet and savory recipes for you to try at home!

programme.title: Cheat Day!
programme.desc: On this episode, we help you splurge with some of our favorite cheat day recipes! No calorie counting allowed!

programme.title: 4th of July Remixed
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale grills up his 4th of July favorites, like galbi smash double cheeseburgers and char sui bbq ribs.

programme.title: Its Taco Time
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 All Up In My Grill

programme.title: Saints and Soldiers: Airborne Creed
programme.desc: 15. elokuuta 1944, amerikkalaisten 517:n laskuvarjorykmentin joukkue hyppaa etela-Ranskan ylla tehtavanaan avustaa ja suojata liittoutuneiden joukkojen marssia Berliiniin. Laskeuduttuaan vihollisen hallinta-alueelle joukko joutuu valittomasti hyokkayksen kohteeksi. Kolme laskuvarjojaakaria ajautuu erilleen ryhmastaan ja pyrkiessaan takaisin joukkojensa luo suorittamaan tehtavansa loppuun, miehet tormaavat epatoivoisiin vastarintaliikkeen taistelijoihin. Paattaessaan auttaa kapinallisia vapauttamaan kiinniotettuja tovereitaan, he vaarantavat oman henkensa. Toiminnallaan he noudattavat rykmenttinsa kunniakoodia nimelta Airborne Creed.

programme.title: Hardcore
programme.desc: Et muista mitaan. Osittain, koska vaimosi heratti sinut juuri kuolleista. Han kertoo, etta nimesi on Henry. Viisi minuuttia myohemmin sinua ammutaan, vaimosi on kidnapattu ja sinun pitaisi luultavasti lahtea etsimaan hanta. Kuka hanet vei? Hanen nimensa on Akan, han on vaikutusvaltainen sotapaallikko, jolla on palkkamurhaajien armeija ja suunnitelma maailman valloittamiseksi. Sina olet Moskovassa, itsellesi tuntemattomassa kaupungissa, ja kaikki haluavat tappaa sinut. Kaikki paitsi salaperainen brittikaveri Jimmy. Han saattaa olla puolellasi, mutta et ole varma. Jos kestat mielipuolisuuden ja selviat, saatat saada selville tarkoituksesi ja totuuden identiteettisi takana.

programme.title: American Exit
programme.desc: Charlie Bond on tienhaarassa elamassaan. Han on eronnut hiljattain vaimostaan, kun hanta pyydetaan huolehtimaan viikonloppuna pojastaan Leosta. Huono ajoitus, silla Charlie on juuri toteuttamassa taidevarkautta helpon rahan toivossa. Leo ei tieda suunnitelmasta mitaan, han odottaa vain, etta saisi olla kaivatun isan kanssa. Samalla todellisuus saa Charlien kiinni; haikailemattomat ammattitappajat jahtaavat hanta. Hanen ainoa toivonsa on paeta maasta ja parantaa suhteensa Leoon, jota han on laiminlyonyt monet vuodet.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Lahjakas asianajaja Casey McKay matkustaa ex-vaimonsa kotikaupunkiin puolustamaan taman veljea, jota syytetaan piirisyyttajan murhasta. Siella McKay saa selville salaliiton, joka johtaa hanet avoimeen konfliktiin kaupungin korruptoituneimman rakennuttajan Gatesin kanssa. Entinen merijalkavaen sotilas auttaa Caseyta, kun kay ilmi, etta han tarvitsee muutakin kuin juridista asiantuntemusta pysyakseen hengissa ja voittaakseen jutun

programme.title: Salt And Fire
programme.desc: Tutkija kidnapataan ja heitetaan tappavaan autiomaahan, jossa hanen on taisteltava luonnonvoimia vastaan selvitakseen.

programme.title: Triassic Hunt
programme.desc: Kun kaksi geneettisesti kehiteltya dinosaurusta karkaa laboratoriosta, joukko palkkasotilaita kutsutaan ottamaan ne kiinni. Mutta kun sotilaat tajuavat, etta dinosaurukset ovat yhta viisaita kuin ihmiset, alkaa uskomaton kissa- ja hiirileikki.

programme.title: Alien Code
programme.desc: Purettuaan satelliitista loytyneen viestin salakirjoituksen nerokas kryptografi Alex huomaa hallituksen agenttien seuraavan hanta, ja yliluonnollisia asioita alkaa tapahtua.

programme.title: Joyride
programme.desc: Hurmaava Jon on epaonnistunut elamassaan ja paattaa lahtea tavoittelemaan menetettya rakkautta. Autoekspertti Luke pakenee menneisyyttaan. Yhdessa hampurilaispaikassa tyoskentelevan vegaaniaktivisti Keiran kanssa he rikkovat normeja ja paatyvat ajamaan “lainatulla” keltaisella Mini Cooperilla Uuden-Seelannin poikki, poliisi ja media perassaan.

programme.title: Senkka nenasta pojat!
programme.desc: Jarjestaytyneen rikollisuuden vedonlyojat, korttihait ja huijarit piinaavat toimillaan Miamia, ja poliisin johto on paattanyt ottaa kovat keinot kayttoon ja puhdistaa kaupungin. Mutta koska poliisin omat resurssit eivat riita toivottuun lopputulokseen, varvataan veljekset, Johnny ja Charlie Flippo, likaisen tyon hommaan...Vaikka Johnny on laivaston upseeri ja Charlie vain rekkakuski, on heidan urbaanit selviytymiskykynsa ja kontaktit legendaariset. Veljekset sukeltavat alamaailman kuvioihin kuin kalat veteen, ja pistavat taidoillaan seka nyrkeillaan rikollisten paat sekaisin! Mutta Johnny ja Charlie eivat ole kuvioissa mukana hyvaa hyvyyttaan - taytyyhan omista eduista pitaa myos kiinni.

programme.title: Varkaita ja veijareita
programme.desc: "Bud Spencer esittaa kovanyrkkista poliisia, ylikonstaapeli Parkeria, joka saa tehtavakseen ottaa kiinni lipevan gigolon, Tony Roman, jolle vanhemmat rouvat jalokivineen ovat helppoja saaliita. Pian kuitenkin panokset pelissa muuttuvat kovemmiksi, kun Tony todistaa Mafian tappoiskun. Mafian ollessa valmis raivaamaan todistajat hengilta tylyn armottomalla tyylillaan, on Parkerin suojeltava Tonya ja varmistettava taman paasy elossa todistamaan. Kytan ja varkaan epatavallinen taistelupari saa aikaa valtaisaa tuhoa alamaailman keskuudessa..."

programme.title: Banaanipojat hula-hula saarella
programme.desc: Huoletonta elamaa viettava onnenonkija Alan saa kasiinsa aarrekartan, josta selviaa japanilaisten sotajoukkojen toisen maailmansodan aikana katkeman rahasaaliin sijainti. Rahojen loytaminen on kuitenkin helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Aarre sijaitsee kaukaisella trooppisella autiosaarella ja lisaksi kartan perassa ovat kaupungin gangsterit.Paastakseen roistoja pakoon ja aarretta etsimaan, piiloutuu Alan rauhaa rakastavan Charlien veneeseen. Monen mutkan ja koitoksen jalkeen Alan ja Charlie paasevat saarelle, ainoastaan huomatakseen ettei se olekaan asumaton.

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: Nuori israelilaismies Yossi Ghinsberg hylkaa turvallisen tulevaisuuden ja lahtee jahtaamaan unelmaansa Amazonin sademetsan salaperaisissa syvyyksissa. Vuoden ajan han kulkee tunnettuja reitteja, mutta kun han ja kaksi uutta matkakumppania, Kevin Gale ja Marcus Stamm, seuraavat synkan karismaattista Karl Ruchprecteria viidakkoon, unelman toteutus muuttuu psyykkiseksi voimien ja rohkeuden mitteloksi. Tositarina aarioloissa selviytymisesta. Perustuu Yossi Ghinsbergin menestysmuistelmiin.

programme.title: The Villainess
programme.desc: Ammattitappaja Sook-hee kostaa miehille, jotka surmasivat hanen aviomiehensa. Menetettyaan tajuntansa han heraa kansallisen turvallisuuspalvelun tiloissa. Turvallisuuspalvelu haluaa hanet huippusalaisiin tehtaviin ja Sook-hee paattaa hyvaksya uuden identiteetin Yeon-Soona pysyakseen hengissa. Han tapaa Hyun-soon ja alkaa unelmoida perheen perustamisesta. Mutta haapaivana hanelle annetaan tehtava, joka muuttaa kaiken.

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: Mies heraa sairaalassa, eika hanella ole muistikuvaa siita, kuka han on tai miten han paatyi sinne. Hanta hoitava Diana (Eastwood) ei loyda mitaan henkilopapereita, joten han kutsuu miesta John Doeksi (Rhys Meyers). Poliisi syyttaa Johnia sarjamurhaajaksi, joka on tappanut useita nuoria naisia alueella. Kun Johnia aiotaan kuulustella, han onnistuu pakenemaan Dianan avulla, joka on varma hanen syyttomyydestaan. He ajavat viimeisimmalle rikospaikalle etsimaan johtolankoja ja vastauksia todistaakseen Johnin syyttomyyden. Hyva sairaanhoitaja kuulee raastavan totuuden Johnin henkilollisyydesta seka valheiden ja petosten verkosta, joka vie Johnin viela viimeiseen ratkaisevaan taisteluun.

programme.title: Flight World War II
programme.desc: Nykyaikaisen 757:n matkustajat tekevat aikamatkan takaisin 1940-luvulle ja joutuvat kamppailemaan hengestaan keskella saksalaisten ja liittoutuneitten taistelua. Yrittaessaan pysya hengissa he onnistuvat vaikuttamaan historiaan ja toisen maailmansodan loppuratkaisuun.

programme.title: Transference
programme.desc: Josh on aina varuillaan ja vainoharhojen vallassa. Han elaa hyvin rasittavaa elamaa, koska pitaa hairiintynytta sisartaan piilossa salaisessa bunkkerissa. Han yrittaa pitaa sisaren yliluonnolliset voimat salassa muulta maailmalta. Kun sisar akkia sairastuu, Josh joutuu turvautumaan tiedemiehen apuun saadakseen sisarensa terveeksi. Kohtalokas paatos aiheuttaa sen, etta sisaren supervoimat paljastuvat.

programme.title: Superkytta
programme.desc: Dave Speed on Miamin poliisivoimien ramapaa, jolta rikollisuuden kitkeminen hoituu luonnostaan. Erasta tehtavaa hoitaessaan, Dave altistuu pahemman kerran ydinaseen sateilylle, eika mikaan ole enaa kuin ennen. Han saa yliluonnolliset supervoimat, ja pian Miamin rikoskayrat ovat rajussa laskussa. Vastavetona paattavat kaupungin paarikolliset ratkaista ongelman nimelta Dave Speed hinnalla ja keinolla milla hyvansa... Superkytan voimat joutuvat kerta toisensa jalkeen todelliselle koetukselle, mutta ei hataa, niin kauan kuin han ei nae mitaan punaista. Kyseinen vari on Davelle kuin kryptoniitti Terasmiehelle...

programme.title: Cold Zone
programme.desc: Myrsky lahestyy. Kukaan ei pysty ennustamaan sita. Kukaan ei pysty mittaamaan sen voimaa. Yhden perheen on pakko kestaa se. Kukaan ei voi etsia suojaa myrskylta, kukaan ei paase pois kylmasta...

programme.title: American Exit
programme.desc: Charlie Bond on tienhaarassa elamassaan. Han on eronnut hiljattain vaimostaan, kun hanta pyydetaan huolehtimaan viikonloppuna pojastaan Leosta. Huono ajoitus, silla Charlie on juuri toteuttamassa taidevarkautta helpon rahan toivossa. Leo ei tieda suunnitelmasta mitaan, han odottaa vain, etta saisi olla kaivatun isan kanssa. Samalla todellisuus saa Charlien kiinni; haikailemattomat ammattitappajat jahtaavat hanta. Hanen ainoa toivonsa on paeta maasta ja parantaa suhteensa Leoon, jota han on laiminlyonyt monet vuodet.

programme.title: Final Shot
programme.desc: Salamurhaaja Frank on jattanyt aiemman tyonsa ja yrittaa nyt elaa naennaisesti tavallista elamaa tyttoystavansa ja tyttarensa kanssa. Pahamaineinen mafiapomo tulee yhtena paivana kaymaan pyytaakseen Frankilta apua. Mafiapomon nuori tytar on surmattu. Frank ei halua vetaa perhettaan mukaan mahdollisiin ongelmiin, ja hanen on paatettava, tekeeko murhan pomonsa puolesta vai saako rauhan omalle sielulleen.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: Triassic Hunt
programme.desc: Kun kaksi geneettisesti kehiteltya dinosaurusta karkaa laboratoriosta, joukko palkkasotilaita kutsutaan ottamaan ne kiinni. Mutta kun sotilaat tajuavat, etta dinosaurukset ovat yhta viisaita kuin ihmiset, alkaa uskomaton kissa- ja hiirileikki.

programme.title: Delta Farce
programme.desc: Kolmea ystavysta luullaan sotilaiksi ja heidat laitetaan Irakin lentokoneeseen. Kun heidat on tiputettu lentokoneesta, loytavat he itsensa syrjaisesta kylasta, joka tarvitsee kipeasti apua. Pystyvatko he olemaan sankareita oikeasti?

programme.title: Texas Red
programme.desc: Tositarina legendaarisesta Texas Redista, afroamerikkalaisesta miehesta, jota sadat laittomat cowboyt jahtasivat rajusti pitkin preerian karua maisemaa Mississippin talvisen eramaan halki. Kaikki halutuimman palkinnon saamiseksi.

programme.title: Sightings
programme.desc: Tieteiselokuvamysteeri teksasilaisella ranchilla asuvasta riitaisasta perheesta, jota uhkaa metsassa piileksiva olio. Selviytyakseen hengissa uhkasta, heidan on samalla ratkaistava omat sisaiset ristiriitansa.

programme.title: Eliittijoukot (Elite Squad)
programme.desc: Perustuu Batalhao de Operações Policiais Especiaisin (BOPE), Rio de Janeiron sotilaspoliisin erikoisjoukkojen, kokemuksiin.

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Raivokkaassa toisen maailmansodan Saipanin taistelussa kersantti Joe Enders (Nicolas Cage) vartioi – ja ystavystyy – Ben Yahzeen (Adam Beach) kanssa, nuoren navajon, joka on koulutettu kayttamaan ainoaa sodanaikaista koodia, jota vihollinen ei koskaan murtautunut... Navajo-koodia. Mutta jos Yahzee joutuu vihollisen kasiin, kuinka pitkalle Enders on valmis menemaan pelastaakseen armeijan voimakkaimman salaisuuden? John Woo ohjaa taman toimintapitoisen eeppisen elokuvan, joka on saanut innoituksensa navajosotilaiden todellisesta tarinasta, joiden rohkeus ja uhraukset auttoivat voittamaan sodan Tyynellamerella.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill
programme.desc: Bravo Companyn miehet kohtaavat uskomattoman taiston Hamburger Hillilla. Neljatoista sotaan vasynytta sotilasta taistelevat mudan tayttamasta maanpalasta, joka on nimetty sen mukaan, miten se jauhaa sotilaita kuin jauhelihaa. He taistelevat maansa, toveriensa ja henkiensa puolesta. Sota on yhta helvettia, mutta tama on kauhistuttavampaa. Hamburger Hill kertoo tarinan niin kuin se todella meni. Se on raaka, inhorealistinen ja armoton dramatisointi eraasta Amerikan julmimmista, verisimmista taisteluista. Tama on taytta totta. Hamburger Hill - sotaa pahimmillaan, miehet parhaimmillaan.

programme.title: Meidan gangstereiden kesken
programme.desc: Painija Charlie ja jaatelonmyyja Sonny ovat huolettomia ja mukavia kavereita, jotka pysyttelevat poissa vaikeuksista. Mutta kun kaupungin ja alamaailman johtaja erehtyy luulemaan heita pahamaineiseksi tappajakaksikoksi, kaikki muuttuu... Pelastaakseen omat nahkansa Charlie ja Sonny pysyvat vaiti todellisista henkilollisyyksistaan ja pelaavat mukana hamatakseen gangstereita. Kun Charlie ja Tom saavat tehtavakseen hoidella kilpaileva perhe paivilta, ei heille jaa muuta mahdollisuutta kuin ottaa ohjat omiin kasiinsa... Bud Spencerin ystavaa Sonnya nayttelee Giuliano Gemma. Han on muun muassa vaikuttanut spaghettiwesternelokuvassa ”Ringo - tappaja” ja Dario Argenton jannarissa ”Tenebre”.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget wont settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This weeks episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, hes got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This weeks episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. Its a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and cant wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworxs cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canadas leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marinos busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Lauras going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they werent thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eves challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they cant agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesnt want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style theyll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. Hes a marketing director and shes a doctor so shes often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. Shes a physical therapist and shes a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. Theyre looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
