programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb and Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria cant decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshalls homeland) or Cuba (Marias homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan and Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition and Jins objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jins client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, and waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mikes couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto and Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, and want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space and want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, and breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inezs couple is looking for and these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inezs client currently lives in a condo and have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mikes friend invites him to an Indian wedding and tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, and Jin support and donate to Mikes charity after winning a bet amongst them and the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property and a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl and Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found and Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryls client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land and nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit and eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inezs client is selling their separate properties and looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inezs couple is not too picky and open to different kinds of properties. Daryl and Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client and the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mikes client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land and privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 and 16 Jins client is definitely going to need lots of space and land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, and Mike attend Jins band practice to support her and listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently and this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen and Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver and want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl and the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryls client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, and Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business and later in the episode Mike and Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy and always having a project on the go. Inezs client loves to build and create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario and discuss the clients wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget wont settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Maes long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This weeks episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, hes got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isnt seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steves got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This weeks episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. Its a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and cant wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworxs cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canadas leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marinos busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Lauras going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they werent thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eves challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they cant agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesnt want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryls listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Suhail and Niki have busy schedules. Hes a marketing director and shes a doctor so shes often on call for a hospital downtown. Can they find a place that can help relieve stress, but also be close enough to downtown for those urgent calls? They want a secluded home with at least 1 acre and magnificent views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. Shes a physical therapist and shes a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. Theyre looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! Theyre looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryls got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: For the ever-dwindling Parsi community of western India, food is both pleasure and heritage — and a secret language in danger of dying out. Eisha meets the renowned food blogger and caterer, Mehnaz Mansud, who introduces her to some of the forgotten recipes of Parsi cuisine such as Dodima Gosht, the unusual and yet sublime fusion of mutton and bottle gourd.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bliss, Sunny Beach Bulgaria
programme.desc: Along with basking in the idyllic beach scenes of Bulgaria, Kirsty admires the art in Helena resort, and experiences the local traditions and cuisine.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: Here is a list of Oman’s must-see attractions, each of which unveils a unique facet of this Middle Eastern gem.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 World Spas Gaya Island Resort, Malaysia
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries a massage inspired by the waves of the sea and a chocolate vanilla body wrap at the Gaya Island Resort in Malaysia.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Great World Hotels Dieswaene (ENG)
programme.desc: Elisha gets some old-world style pampering at Die Swaene, a luxury boutique hotel situated in the heart of the historic center of Bruges.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Food Guide Salzburg, Austria
programme.desc: Salzburg, boasts a culinary scene as sensational as Mozart, the composer who was born here. Chef Joe Remblance enjoys some of its celebrated dishes.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Viajar Mexico El Tule
programme.desc: Charlie shows the best ways to navigate the vibrant culinary scene of Mexico’s gastronomic capital, Oaxaca.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.desc: On a trip to Amman, one of the world’s oldest cities, Shaunak finds himself taken back to a different stage of the city’s history at every turn.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Quest Fort Begu 2, India
programme.desc: While the vast majority of Rajasthan’s inhabitants have always been staunch vegetarians, there has been tremendous popularity of the meat dishes in the state’s culinary culture. This came mainly from the Rajput rulers, which is why Alex meets Ajayraj Singh who comes from a royal lineage. He introduces her to the history of the valiant rulers of Mewar and some of the secret meat preparations of the kingdom

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Timeless Tamil Nadu Thanjavur, India
programme.desc: Alex takes a trip to Thanjavur, curious about why it has always been called “the cradle of arts”. Soon, she is lost in the magnificence of the Great Living Chola Temples, with their stunning architecture and intricate carvings, rich in symbolism. At a center for making bronze statues, she is surprised to find out how ancient is the art form. The highlight of her trip, however, is a visit to a workshop for making musical instruments, where she is treated to an impromptu performance.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Bucket List Hitoyoshi, Japan
programme.desc: A classic steam locomotive leading you to a relaxing hot spring bath in the mountainside - sounds like a story, doesn’t it? Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty make this story come true with an onsen or a traditional Japanese hot spring bath in Hitoyoshi, an idyllic town surrounded by mountains and blessed with the Kumagawa river.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Viajar Mexico Villa Del Carbon
programme.desc: From greenery and culture to spiritual power, Charlie reveals the things that make some of Mexico’s towns ‘Pueblo Magicos’.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Jordan Jerash, Jordan
programme.desc: Shaunak visits the Roman ruins strewn across an ancient city that was buried in sand for hundreds of years.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Quest Heritage Haveli, India
programme.desc: Where many ancient Indian civilizations flourished in the most resource-filled areas, the people of Rajasthan created a powerful, complex, layered and regal culture and cuisine in the largely arid land that they called home. Alex discovers this when she meets Anjali Singh, a member of the royal family of Jaipur, who shows her how to make two prized recipes from her family’s legacy - Papad Ki Chutney and Safed Murg.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Timeless Tamil Nadu Nilgiris, India
programme.desc: Ooty has been known to charm visitors ever since British officers used to go there to escape the infamous Indian summer. Sipping tea at the tiered tea plantations, strolling by serene lakes and gushing waterfalls, gawking at gentle deer and majestic elephants at Mudumalai National Park, Alex loses herself in the breathtaking natural beauty of this retreat nestled in the Nilgiri hills.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Bucket List Takachiho, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty try bungee jumping at the staggeringly high Kobae Bridge. Following this, they explore some rejuvenating nature trails at Takachiho, stumble upon a shrine in a park, and learn the story behind it in a riveting manner, later that day.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Viajar Mexico Ciudad De Mexico
programme.desc: Enter Charlie Rubio: a bona fide Mexican, who is here to reveal all the wonderful things that make Mexico his favorite place in the world.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.desc: Shaunak navigates the lost city of Petra that was once the capital of the powerful Nabatean empire.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Bihar’s rural heartland has a lot to offer the intrepid traveller. Alex meets Rajesh Ramjan, a politician, a cultural conservationist and a foodie, who shows her the beauty of Bihar’s countryside and introduces her to some traditional Bihari dishes. From dahi-chura, the Bihari breakfast of champions to flavourful preparations of fresh local vegetables simmering on a traditional stove, Alex gets an understanding of the nourishing cuisine that fuels farmers to toil in the fields all day.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Timeless Tamil Nadu Kodaikanal, India
programme.desc: Kodaikanal - the name means “The Gift of the Forest”. True to its name, the cozy hill station nestled in Tamil Nadu’s Palani Hills is captivating with its verdant hills, cascading waterfalls, and postcard-perfect lakes. Alex is truly astonished, however, when she stumbles onto an observatory here that has been tracking solar activity for around 115 years!

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: The caldera, Mount Aso, is home to Japan’s most active volcano. It is also the perfect destination for those seeking an adrenaline rush and some breathtaking views. Amidst the various moods of the caldera, Daniel Coll and Paddy Doherty explore the unique experiences this caldera has to offer.

programme.title: City breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 City breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Stories of king Timur’s reign and the Silk road lie in the mosaic-covered masterpieces of ancient Samarkand.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous granite city of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Xplore Jordan Wadi Rum
programme.desc: Shaunak is enchanted by the surreal landscape of Wadi Rum in Jordan, but the highlight of his trip is finding an ancient map hidden in a cave.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Considered among the oldest communities in India, the Gaud Saraswat Brahmans have a culture and cuisine that is still largely unexplored. Eisha sets out to explore the lesser-known flavours of this cuisine with the renowned chef, Sudip Pai, who introduces her to some of the culinary gems of his community. While she cooks with him, she also comes to know about the beliefs and traditions that govern the cuisine and way of life of the community.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Timeless Tamil Nadu Madurai, India
programme.desc: During her travels across Tamil Nadu, Alex finally reaches one of India’s most famous pilgrimage sites – Madurai. She pays her respects at the nerve center of the city – the Meenakshi Amman Temple. Her exploration of Madurai reveals to her, however, that there is another, rather delightful side to this revered city.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 Xp Guide Kutna Hora, Czech Republic
programme.desc: The medieval treasury of Czech kings, Kutná Hora owes its prominence to its mines. In fact, the richness of the city’s silver mines was what saw it declared a royal city and made the seat of the Bohemian Royal Mint. As Rohan visits the city’s significant monuments such as a cathedral dedicated to the patron saint of all miners and the erstwhile central mint of the country, he finds out interesting stories about its mining and minting history.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Narlai and Jawai, India
programme.desc: The need for a short, refreshing break leads Asmita to a quaint hamlet in Rajasthan, where life has remained unchanged since the 15th century.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Xplore
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Xplore Jordan Dead Sea
programme.desc: Shaunak visits the ‘City of Mosaics’ in Jordan, where he sees a 6th century mosaic map of the Holy Land on the floor of an ancient Byzantine church.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: For the ever-dwindling Parsi community of western India, food is both pleasure and heritage — and a secret language in danger of dying out. Eisha meets the renowned food blogger and caterer, Mehnaz Mansud, who introduces her to some of the forgotten recipes of Parsi cuisine such as Dodima Gosht, the unusual and yet sublime fusion of mutton and bottle gourd.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Timeless Tamil Nadu Karaikudi, India
programme.desc: A town defined by medieval grandeur, Karaikudi transports Alex to the era when affluent Chettiar merchants built splendid mansions as a status symbol. At one of these mansions, the secrets of the Chettinad cuisine, heavy on meat and heat, begin to unfold.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 Xp Guide Cesky Krumlov
programme.desc: Český Krumlov Castle is one of the most important monuments in Central Europe in terms of architectural standard, cultural tradition and scale.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: With just 48 hours on hand, London-based adventurer, Natalie Gayle has set out to explore the true character of the Lion City: Singapore.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Timeless Tamil Nadu Rameshwaram, India
programme.desc: In the last leg of her journey in Tamil Nadu, Alex visits one of India’s southernmost towns, Rameshwaram. Here, she is treated to stunning views of azure waters and coral islands that stretch all the way to Sri Lanka. What she doesnt expect to find, however, are the ruins of a ghost town sitting on a beach.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Great World Hotels The Residence (ENG)
programme.desc: Frieshia feels the magic of Mauritius through the unique blend of modernity and tradition offered at the luxury resort.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E34 XP Guide Bangkok, Thailand
programme.desc: Derived from Thai words, "Bang" meaning Village and "Kok" meaning Olive, the city transformed from fishing village to a cosmopolitan as we know today.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Traditional Hungarian fare is a hearty affair, not meant for the faint-hearted. The cuisine has imbibed influences from the days of its Ottoman occupation as well as from the other nations of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and traditional Jewish cuisine. Celebrity chef and traveller, Joe Remblance explores the nuances of this cuisine in Budapest, the capital city, through local dishes such as Schnitzel, Gundel Palacsinta, Hungarian Lángos and Tokaji, a sweet Hungarian wine.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: With just 48 hours on hand, London-based adventurer, Natalie Gayle has set out to explore the true character of the Lion City: Singapore.

But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the citys infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous granite city of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finlands largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martins Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.desc: Eyelashes freeze, dogs swim in the street, and more of the unexpected on this Extreme Weather Countdown!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.desc: Youve arrived at the only place flash floods, thunderstorms, avalanches, and gale force winds will flash before your eyes one after the other. Thats right, youre watching Extreme Weather Countdown, and we have an all-new lineup prepared today.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Storm Chaser Jaclyn Whittal anxiously experiences her first Category 4 Tropical Storm.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: It’s exhilarating. It’s heart-wrenching. Mark and other storm hunters dive head first into some of the most destructive and deadly hurricanes to hit the US mainland in this millennium.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: Canada’s weather is complex and powerful! Mark and fellow storm hunters chase down avalanches in British Columbia’s back country, twisters in Saskatchewan, and hurricane scale storms in Newfoundland. Enduring extreme weather is just an ordinary day for the True North Strong.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: The Stormhunters find themselves knee deep in flood waters as historic rainfall threatens to wash them away.

programme.title: Zero Gravity Bath with Sinclair
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Zero Gravity Bath with Sinclair
programme.desc: Val gives an appointment to the singer Sinclair, for a floating session: a sensory deprivation technique in a bath. Then, we will discover an experience that is all the rage across the Atlantic, the Barre Shape! Its a class that mixes classical dance, yoga and cardio training. All this in a girly and boudoir atmosphere. After the effort comes comfort! We will meet a Superfood expert who will make us test and discover all the "Superfoods" that are very popular in California and that the whole healthy world is talking about.

programme.title: Collecting seeds
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Collecting seeds
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to save seeds. As you may have noticed, fruits, such as apples and lemons, contain seeds, but so do some of the vegetables you eat, such as peppers and tomatoes. This is because they are, in fact, fruits just like the apple and the lemon. They come from a flower and therefore contain seeds.

programme.title: Salty sweet bowl
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Minute Bowl - Season 1 - Salty sweet bowl
programme.desc: In this episode we will prepare a delicious sweet and salty bowl. For this you will need salad, watermelon, melon, avocado, carrot, orange, raspberries, olive oil, sesame. And herbs of Provence. This bowl will delight people who like to associate sweet and salty flavors in their daily cooking.

programme.title: Sweet peach
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Detox minute - Season 1 - Sweet peach
programme.desc: Follow the chefs detox juice recipes and youll be able to make your own juices. What could be better than combining business with pleasure? Take care of your body by making and enjoying delicious juices.

programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Destination Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Blue Zones of Longevity - Season 1 - Destination Okinawa
programme.desc: Genetic, biological, cultural and dietary factors combine to make the Japanese island of Okinawa a zone of extreme longevity. Why is it that cancer is virtually non-existent here? Well see that the famous Japanese trio of "rice, fish and soy" is not the key to longevity, but a diet based on plants, lots of green leafy vegetables and endemic sweet potatoes. Self-restriction and strong social ties are other elements that our naturopathic chef and attending physician will discover on site, together with local inhabitants and scientists.

programme.title: USA: The end of oil - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - USA: The end of oil - Part 2
programme.desc: "The end of oil" is the amazing story of a raw material which has revolutionized mans life in just a century. But today, oil reserves are depleting. In his crazy race for always more production, Man didnt manage to preserve this precious energy that took million years for the Earth to give out. To tell the adventure of oil, Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team went to the United States, the country which depends the most on black gold. At the start of the 21st century, it is now urgent to realize that oil resources are limited. Its today that we have to act and get organized, in order to prepare the new era to come. While all our economies are based on the petrol barrels price, well...

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Massages
programme.desc: Massage studio will show you the best massage techniques in places which will make you dream. Let us take care of you! Lay down, relax and forget all your problems.

programme.title: My Zen Relaxation
programme.desc: Turn down the lights, kick your shoes back, take a cup of tea... Youre on MyZen TV, time to relax.

programme.title: Pilates
programme.desc: Stay in shape with our pilates courses !

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Practice Yoga from the comfort of your home with our experienced teatchers.

programme.title: The Bunny
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Origami - Season 1 - The Bunny
programme.desc: Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. In modern usage, the word “origami” is used as an inclusive term for all paper folding, regardless of their cultural origin. Different folding and sculpting techniques, new models, bright colors – you’ll see all of this in our program! We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: The Heart
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Origami - Season 1 - The Heart
programme.desc: Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. In modern usage, the word “origami” is used as an inclusive term for all paper folding, regardless of their cultural origin. Different folding and sculpting techniques, new models, bright colors – you’ll see all of this in our program! We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: Self-massage for the face
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 6 - Self-massage for the face
programme.desc: No time to relax and get a massage? These exercises let you relax by massaging yourself.

programme.title: Joint relaxation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Joint relaxation
programme.desc: The joints are the first parts of the body to react badly to stress, therefore it is essential to relax and relieve them as often as possible. Some ankle and knee rotations, combined with calm, controlled breathing will allow you to soothe your joints. With a few simple, well-targeted exercises, this session will bring you deep relaxation.

programme.title: Leaving the workplace
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 9 - Leaving the workplace
programme.desc: An interview to prepare for? A capricious superior? These are complex situations to deal with. These exercises will help you mentally prepare for different professional situations.

programme.title: Self-massage for the arms
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 6 - Self-massage for the arms
programme.desc: In order to feel in charge of your body, MyZen TV offers you this guided self-massage exercise. The aim is to relax and regain your natural body tone so that you can face any future events with strength and control.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 1
programme.desc: For this new episode, Yann Arthus-Bertrand travels through Senegal to encounter men and women who dedicate their lives to preserving the environment. One of the major ecological stakes of the country is fishing and the mangrove ecosystem which, like in some many other parts of the world, faces major threats. Yann Arthus-Bertrand presents the struggle of Haidar El Ali, chosen among one of the world’s most active ecologists. He creates protected marine areas and reforests the disappeared mangrove of his country. He’s managed to convince thousands of Senegalese to plant with him ten million mangrove trees.

programme.title: Spicy kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Spicy kitchen
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes us on a tour of spices and aromatic plants. Spices are a call to travel, to faraway lands and to the unknown. In the kitchen, they bear witness to our relationship with others, reflecting our vision of the world. Julies journey will introduce us to the famous black pepper, thanks to Erwann de Kerros, an insatiable pepper seeker. Aromatic plants will also be in the spotlight, as we pick them with Edouard Loubet in the Luberon...

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Paddle Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Paddle Yoga
programme.desc: ValKahl tries out the addictive and zen yoga lesson on water on a paddleboard with YOGAqua, in Marina Del Rey. After learning to make some delightful and healthy wrap in restaurant KYE’S, she does sightseeing in Malibu Wine Hikes, the organic grapes garden behind Malibu’s famous beaches. Along the way, she can’t resist biting a mustard plant, feeding and ‘french kissing’ Stanley, the celebrity giraffe. She later harvests some fresh organic vegetables in Saddle Rock Garden!

programme.title: Chocolate Tan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Chocolate Tan
programme.desc: Never thought yoga and chocolate could be a healthy combination? You were wrong! Since everything is organic in California, chocolate tanning is the best way to stay glamorous while taking care of your skin with natural and delicious products. After testing this chocolate tan, well be sweating it out at Tantris, the three-story yoga studio in the heart of Hollywood.

programme.title: The essentials
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - The essentials
programme.desc: Sara is in the market garden of Romainville, a new urban greenhouse near to Paris. In this season of My first garden, we will learn to garden together. In each episode, we will give tips and tricks to have beautiful plants and a nice vegetable garden at home.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Detox minute - Season 1 - Red roots
programme.desc: Follow the chefs detox juice recipes and youll be able to make your own juices. What could be better than combining business with pleasure? Take care of your body by making and enjoying delicious juices.

programme.title: Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare a creamy, comforting cauliflower and celeriac veloute. This mild, delicate soup is spiced up with condiments like paprika, garlic and oregano, and a touch of olive oil for an even more gourmet texture. An ideal dish for a light starter or a warming dinner.

programme.title: Masashi Hirao
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Masashi Hirao
programme.desc: In 2003, Masashi Hirao became the last apprentice of Japans great Bonsai master Saburo Kato. Before Saburo-san died he passed on to his apprentice a seemingly impossible mission: to prevent the 1000 year old art from dying-out in the face of a rapidly changing world and achieve his master’s vision of bringing peace to the world through bonsai. Masashi’s early efforts are dogged by many failures but combining his master’s guidance and modern instincts he sets out to travel the world and discover the way, drawing on innovative trends in contemporary art.

programme.title: Tough pregnancies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Tough pregnancies
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni are worried, since a pregnancy with twins is always riskier. She’s due in two months, and has already undergone two medical interventions. Kim, nineteen, is fine physically, but she has to face her family’s criticism: she still lives at her parent’s, and the absence of the father-to-be worries them a great deal. Coralie would rather be safe than sorry, and meets with a prenatal consultant. Her nightmare: being turned down for an epidural procedure... Nathalie and Naoufel are looking at the bright side of life and are chilling on granddaddy’s boat, before letting themselves enjoy a family photo shoot.

programme.title: Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 1
programme.desc: To better understand the role of these explosive mountains located all over the world, on land or under the sea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand goes to Italy, the country with the most active volcanoes in Europe. Accompanied by volcano expert Jacques-Marie Bardintzeff, the photographer meets those people who have chosen to live with « their » volcano, in spite of the dangers involved in this kind of proximity.

programme.title: Journey To The West
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Journey To The West
programme.desc: Finding no way forward in Japan, Masashi looks to break through overseas. But although bonsai had spread widely in his master’s time, it seems doomed to wither if someone doesn’t do something to make the art form fun and relevant in a fast paced modern world. Finally on a trip to Italy, Masashi Hirao may have found a way to break the wall and build a bridge to new audiences. He determines to topple a 1000 years of tradition and turn the art of bonsai into a pop culture phenomenon, combining it with other art forms and focused on the process of creation as much as on the result.

programme.title: Last preps
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Last preps
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni’s boys are born! But they came in a little bit early, and have been admitted in neonatal resuscitation... Coralie and Florent are still walking on clouds as they wait for their daughter, Lena. So are Nathalie and Naoufel, who arrange a tour of the future baby’s bedroom. Things are still tense between Kim and her parents. Her father blames here for having left school too early and the family makes no effort to hide their dislike of Pierre, the would-be father, who is still a no-show. They go as far as opposing Kim’s preferred choice for the future boy’s name, since it was his father that came up with the idea...

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 2
programme.desc: For this new episode, Yann Arthus-Bertrand travels through Senegal to encounter men and women who dedicate their lives to preserving the environment. One of the major ecological stakes of the country is fishing and the mangrove ecosystem which, like in some many other parts of the world, faces major threats. Yann Arthus-Bertrand presents the struggle of Haidar El Ali, chosen among one of the world’s most active ecologists. He creates protected marine areas and reforests the disappeared mangrove of his country. He’s managed to convince thousands of Senegalese to plant with him ten million mangrove trees.

And in Gaza, Palestine, where specialists are fighting to save Palestinian children made ill by unsafe water. In the Jordan Valley, where three countries in conflict face the same problems: the lack of...

programme.title: The taste of honey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The taste of honey

In France, we find an infinite variety of honey: acacia, chestnut, fir, rosemary, orange, spruce, oak, linden or lavender... Well cross forests, fields and even towns, as bees also forage in urbanized areas. Well then cook up emblematic recipes like Vercel gingerbread. Finally, well discover the European dark bee. Protecting this 80-million-year-old bee has become the spearhead of some passionate beekeepers.

programme.desc: Masashi returns from Italy with a new sense of purpose and direction. He will pioneer a radical path as a Bonsai performer, using his childhood powers of concentration and speed to create a new art form and drag bonsai in front of a new generation. Masashi’s bold style makes him a star in Japan. But as his following in Japan grows, Masashi pushes forward with his broader mission - to spread Bonsai culture around the world. He accepts an invitation to take his radical new performance art to Penang, Malaysia, where he discovers new insights into the power of bonsai to bring peace.

programme.title: The Challenge of Leadership
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - The Challenge of Leadership
programme.desc: After years of struggling Masashi Hirao feels he is finding clues to bonsai’s future, changing bonsai’s image of tired old men pruning trees. He has a radical idea to challenge tradition further at the 3-yearly international Setouchi Triennale, the largest art event in Japan. Masashi will stage an Avant Garde personal exhibition as well as a ground-breaking solo performance climaxing with a collaboration with a radical, anti-modernisation punk band, in direct contradiction of Masashi’s mission. It will be a bonsai showdown. Tradition and modernisation clashing head on. Is it possible to pursue change, and preserve tradition? Masashi is in unexplored territory.

programme.title: Saviour or Saboteur
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Saviour or Saboteur
programme.desc: Masashi Hirao is building an entirely new brand, and a new art form: performance bonsai. His quest to push boundaries brings fresh challenges, which come to the fore as he heads to Kuala Lumpur to team up with unconventional Malaysian realist painter, Lee Mar. Little goes to plan and the event strains both artist’s talents to the limit. But the challenge is nothing compared to the test when his radical approach wins him an invitation to the international Bonsai Without Borders Summit in China: 75 world-class Bonsai Masters from 35 countries. The bonsai bad boy has officially arrived on the world stage. It is the ultimate test in front of the most critical audience possible.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Canada - Quebec - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Canada - Quebec - Part 2
programme.desc: Canada is the second largest country in the world by land mass and contains amazing natural resources: 7% of the Earth’s drinking water is spread over the country’s thousands of lakes. Forests cover 45% of the territory. Yann Arthus-Bertrand goes off to discover these resources with those whose job it is to protect them. He takes a look at the ecological balance sheet of the world’s eighth-largest economic power.

programme.title: Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.desc: Above all, these reports are an opportunity for Yann Arthus-Bertrand to take stock of the planet and denounce certain human behaviors that are at the root of dramatic, even irreversible, environmental and climatic degradation. Off to Tokyo, then Kenya, to an animal sanctuary. Then on to Mount Fuji to learn how to live there, and all the plastic that clogs up the seas. Reports will focus on everyday products, chosen for their destructive production practices for both people and the environment.

programme.title: The taste of bread
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The taste of bread
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes you on a bread trail to uncover the dedicated artisan bakers and millers. Her adventure will lead her through the Libourne region, then onwards to the North of France, the Ardèche, and the Aisne, where bakers have transformed bread into a powerful catalyst for social cohesion. While some individuals may avoid bread, particularly due to gluten-related concerns, others have chosen to reposition it at the forefront of the dining experience by championing its nutritional benefits. This commitment is shared by several chefs whom Julie will meet at the conclusion of her expedition.

programme.title: Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.desc: Val Kahl is in the heart of Ojai, the lavender town, where she takes a tour in Ojai Valley Lavender Festival and tastes drink, gluten-free cookies and organic cooking products made of lavender. She later found herself in the middle of lavender field while stopping by the Frog Creek Farm. After working out on the hot power yoga around palm trees in Caravan Outpost, she heads out to Gratitude Rock for an organic fresh juice tasting with an avocado ranch view.

programme.title: Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.desc: Val goes to Nicholas, a master of enlightenment, at his wellness ranch. Here, Val will try out some new high-tech relaxation sessions. She will then go to one of the zenest hotels in California, where she will participate in a yoga session in a Japanese pagoda, followed by a coconut massage. She will test a Cryo-Cafe, a new concept store that mixes coffee break and cryotherapy session. Finally, she will attend a Theremin session, a very special relaxation ceremony.

programme.title: Thinning seedlings
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Thinning seedlings
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to continue gardening together. In our previous episodes, we sowed chives and radishes. Today, were going to learn how to take good care of them. And as a bonus, well show you a great technique to easily get even more plants in your garden. Lets get started!

programme.title: Risotto with asparagus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Risotto with asparagus
programme.desc: In this recipe, we prepare a creamy asparagus risotto, a delicate and refined dish. Arborio rice is slowly simmered in a flavorful broth, then combined with crisp asparagus and melted Parmesan. A hint of lemon and fresh herbs enhances this delicious and comforting meal.

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare delicious potato cutlets accompanied by a creamy vegetable puree. The cutlets are crispy on the outside with Japanese breadcrumbs and tender on the inside, while the celeriac puree adds a touch of sweetness and lightness. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.desc: Juliette has long been aware of the delicate beauty of nature. For years she spent her life on the sea, organising regattas for the traditional sailboats that are famous in the French region of Morbihan. Her appreciation for the elements made for a smooth transition as she decided to leave the water behind and return to the earth. Learning to shape a ball of clay into a graceful and elegant object, she discovered a passion for ceramics. Today, she lives from her creations and makes pieces that reflect their surroundings, the stunning Gulf of Morbihan.

programme.title: Anna (Brittany)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Anna (Brittany)
programme.desc: Anna’s unusual background provided inspiration for her life change. Her career began as a wolf trainer for cinema and it was during these years that she developed her deep love for animals. After being tired of seeing them used as props and constantly in cages, she decided to leave the world of show business behind and start an eco-friendly sheep and goat pasture. To further share her passion for these gentle animals, Anna has opened a conservatory farm where visitors can experience first-hand the joys of being close to nature. She also makes amazing goat cheese!

programme.title: Cristina (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Cristina (Spain)
programme.desc: At 31 years old, the last thing Cristina expected when she went to see the doctor about a blocked ear was to leave the consultation with a diagnosis for Breast Cancer. This young and passionate sociologist decided to apply the same philosophy to her treatment as she did when surfing: when a wave crashes down on you, get up and try again. Through her healing journey she deepened her love for the ocean and also discovered the therapeutic capabilities of yoga for cancer patients. Today she shares her practice through surf and yoga retreats and is specialised in oncological yoga, helping others heal.

programme.title: Idoia (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Idoia (Spain)
programme.desc: Idoia thrives on weaving together the sources of inspiration that surround her. Heavily influenced by the natural beauty of her home region of Galicia, Spain, she creates unique woven pieces from diverse and beautiful materials. Idoia’s pieces represent her vision of a modern woman, drawing from the traditions and experiences of those who perfected the craft before her and also pushing to innovate and adapt her creations for the modern world. Her recent collaboration with luxury fashion house Loewe is a dream come true for this modern artisan.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.desc: With Bangladesh as a running thread, Yann Arthus-Bertrand meets several people who have changed their lives to dedicate themselves to a major project. In Bangladesh, Yves and Runa Marre have created the Friendship Foundation. Among other things, they’ve created a floating hospital installed on an old barge bought in France. Julie Andersen, an ex-advertising executive from New York has come to South Africa to defend sharks with her Shark Angels Foundation. In North India, Kartik Satyanarayan is helping to stop the dreadful exploitation of the lippus bears (dancing bears). He’s created Wildlife SOS, a preserve to rehabilitate the bears that have been rescued and to give work to the men of...

programme.title: USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.desc: "The end of oil" is the amazing story of a raw material which has revolutionized mans life in just a century. But today, oil reserves are depleting. In his crazy race for always more production, Man didnt manage to preserve this precious energy that took million years for the Earth to give out. To tell the adventure of oil, Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team went to the United States, the country which depends the most on black gold. At the start of the 21st century, it is now urgent to realize that oil resources are limited. Its today that we have to act and get organized, in order to prepare the new era to come. While all our economies are based on the petrol barrels price, well...

programme.title: A la carte grills
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - A la carte grills
programme.desc: If youre a nature enthusiast and a fan of outdoor cooking, the upcoming season is perfect for barbecue enthusiasts! Our journey will take us to Aube, nestled in the heart of the Brevonnes forest, and then to the Massif des Bauges, where grilling and snow create a unique combination. Afterward, well explore the Libournais region, where well uncover cooking techniques that make use of vine shoots, which are plentiful in the area. Just a short distance from the vineyards, well arrive at another corner of Gironde, the Blaye region, where the cooking method remains consistent but features a distinctly local ingredient: eel.
