programme.title: Cryotherapy and Vinyasa Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Cryotherapy and Vinyasa Yoga
programme.desc: Its in an episode full of surprise that we meet with Val Khal in the heart of Los Angeles for a visit to the new trendy wellbeing boutique Springs. This new concept store offers the opportunity to make Vinyasa yoga wearing a trendy outfit, treat yourself to a revitalizing juice detox before heading to a Cryotherapy session without leaving the venue! For a relaxing time after an intensive Vinyasa yoga session, Val takes you to a session of Fire cupping where the heath is ideal for getting rid of muscular pains from day-to-day stress.

programme.title: Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.desc: Val takes us to Los Angeles, on the roof of one of the most prestigious hotels in Beverly Hills for a session of acro yoga, aerial acrobatic yoga. Then, in the heart of Downtown, Val will experience a glass slide down one of the tallest towers in California. Shell also try SandBox Fitness, the trendy indoor surfing class, before trying Lazerfit, a new way to work out that combines warm-up, stretching and laser tag.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Daniel Hautot

Is it a real pursuit of happiness? Daniel keeps his acquired skills and puts them to the benefit of his passion for yoga. Follow Daniel until the opening of his yoga and community space.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #08: International Marathon Gorges de l’Ardèche
programme.desc: The Marathon International des Gorges de lArdèche is an annual canoe and kayak race in France. Participants navigate a 27-kilometre course through the breathtaking Ardèche Gorge.

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship Round 4 + 5
programme.desc: In today´s episode we go Down Under to the extrem water athletes in Australia. We´re oing to find out, who will win the Round 4 and 5 of the V8 Superboats Championship 2021.

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary - Part 2
programme.desc: Today we will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean. We´ll visit some of the most terrifying and beautiful waves around the globe.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 and 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: 2025 Open Faces Obertauern Challenger - FWQ FINALS - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour Challenger in Obertauren provides the big stage for the final decisions on qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2026. The elite of the Challenger riders meet for the final decision at the very last contest

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Outdoorsportsteam Paragliding - The Dream of Flight
programme.desc: We take you into the sky and accompany a paragliding virtuoso to the Mont Blanc massif, the Atacama Desert in Chile and the Greek island of Santorini. Follow French paraglider pilot Jean-Baptiste Chandelier.

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: X-Project 2.0
programme.desc: X-project 2.0 is a worldwide unique project where different winter sports unite in front of the backdrop of a Swiss dreamscape in the mountains of Engadin valley (Canton of Grisons).

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary - Part 2
programme.desc: Today we will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean. We´ll visit some of the most terrifying and beautiful waves around the globe.

programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 46

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #5 - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The final showdown of the Freeride World Tour 2022 is right around the corner and it’ll take place in Verbier, Switzerland between 26th of March and 3rd of April.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air Kite and GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.title: Far Away
programme.desc: Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr present a big mountain freeski film, primarily shot in Austria. Through stunning ski footage and heartfelt interviews, the film explores the intense emotions of parents and loved ones as they cope with the risks faced by the skiers.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - Prologue Day
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is an exciting motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. A must for all fans of first-class off-road racing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.desc: The 2023 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in its 16th season – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! The first stop of the tour takes place in Baqueira Beret.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Hakuba (JPN)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour (FWT) has expanded to Asia! The season opener of the worlds most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders takes place in Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Deutschnofen (ITA)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Kicking Horse, Golden BC (CAN)
programme.desc: After an epic start to Winter 2019 in Hakuba, Japan, the worlds best make their way across the Pacific to North America for the second competition of FWT19 at the legendary Canadian Rockies resort of Kicking Horse, Golden BC.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #19: Pasko the Magic Move
programme.desc: Recovering from testicular cancer, professional athlete and filmmaker Maarten Molenaar embarks on a journey to Fuerteventura to learn a new freestyle windsurfing trick - the Pasko.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #25: Profile – Jakob Schubert and Highline Wendestein
programme.desc: Today we dive into the world of alpine sports. In the first part of the show, we look at the greatest achievements of the austian climber Jakob Schubert. Afterwards we turn to a high-wire act by highliner Lukas Irmler, who faces a special challenge in his home mountains

programme.title: Sabandonner au Sauvage
programme.desc: Sabandonner au Sauvage is an adventure in total autonomy without any canoeing experience on the waters of an over 500km long canadian river.

programme.title: Keep On Keeping On
programme.desc: Keep On Keeping On - Dreaming of Rampage portraits Johny Salidos career and his long way to compete at the Rampage - the holy grail of freeride mountainbiking.

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile Dani Arnold - The Art of Iceclimbing
programme.desc: Daniel Arnold was born in 1984 in the Swiss canton of Uri and grew up in the small mountain village of Biel in the heart of the Swiss Alps. Dani and his brother experience all aspects of mountain life: hiking, skiing and climbing in some of the toughest climbing locations in the world

programme.title: WOF 2025 #09: Asics Saintelyon

programme.title: WOF 2025 #10: World Rookie Tour - 20 Years Anniversary Documentary
programme.desc: Launched in 2005, the World Rookie Tour (WRT) is the largest international youth action sports series dedicated to developing the next generation of professional athletes in the sports of snowboarding, freeskiing, skateboarding and surfing.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #11: Epic Series – Season Preview

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #09: SSL Gold Cup
programme.desc: Final Series 2023 - World Class Sailing - SSL Gold Cup 2023Der SSL Gold Cup ist eine spannende Ausscheidungsserie und wird auf den Kanarischen Inseln ausgetragen. Die 24 besten Nationen der SSL-Rangliste und 16 Nationen aus der Qualifikationsserie nehmen daran teil.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Championships 2019 - Latzfons (ITA)
programme.desc: Im Gegensatz zu kunstlichen Rodelbahnen bestehenden Naturbahnen aus BergstraSSen und -wegen. Naturbahnrodeln erfordert eine vollig andere Technik als auf einer Kunstbahn. Im Ziel entscheiden Hundertstelsekunden uber Sieg oder Niederlage.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Umhausen (AUT)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: For this route from Ruhpolding (GER) to Kasern (ITA), 210 kilometers and more than 10000 meters of vert, recreational athletes need approximately five to seven days. Benedikt Boehm is aiming for the magic time limit of 36 hours, non-stop.

programme.title: Underdog
programme.desc: The Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc© - Edition 2018171 kilometers - 10,000 meters ascent - 2,300 runnersFor the 2018 UTMB© Damian Hall is ranked 50th by the International Trail Running Association© (ITRA© ).

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paragliders across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: X-Project 2.0

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: The Edge of the World
programme.desc: Yuma misplaces the the Emperors Key that was an important momento from his parents. He and Astral look high and low for it, but they just cant seem to find it. While they look, Astral is curious as to how the Emperors Key is related to Yumas father. Yuma starts talking about various memories from his childhood that he remembers about his dad. Yumas Never-Give-Up Spirit "Kattobingu" was born from a promise he made with his father.

programme.title: Roots of the Problem
programme.desc: Yuma safely recovers "Number 96: Black Mist" from a man. Tetsuo, who witnessed the Duel, takes note that Yuma seems suddenly more brutal in his strategy, and ends up in a fight with him. Not having reconciled in over 2 days, suddenly Number 96 swallows Yuma and Astral up!! To rescue Yuma and Astral from Number 96, Tetsuo fights the Numbers for the first time!

programme.title: Soras Secret - Part 1
programme.desc: While Yuto is looking for answers, Sora is looking to get some revenge! But when these two tangle, Yuya finds out more than he ever expected!

programme.title: Soras Secret - Part 2
programme.desc: Surprises are in the cards as the battle between Sora and Yuto comes to an unexpected conclusion! But just when Yuya thinks hes seen everything, a new face shows up on the scene that makes Yuya do a triple take!

programme.title: A Dark Reflection
programme.desc: Yuya cant believe his eyes when he finds himself standing face-to-face-to-face with two lookalikes who are out to destroy each other... and everything in sight!

programme.title: Warped Dimensions
programme.desc: Yuya is in a coma, and nothing has been able to stir him from his terrifying state! Is Yuya down for the count, or will his duelmates ESP and TLC make him A-OK?

programme.title: A Duel Personality
programme.desc: Yuyas opponent is Isao Kachidoki from the Ryozanpaku School in the second round of the Maiami Championship.

programme.title: Stealth Warriors
programme.desc: When a mysterious visitor threatens to throw the Championship into chaos, Declan moves in to uncover who they are and soon finds himself facing off against a merciless mercenary!

programme.title: The Master of Magicians, Part 2
programme.desc: It’s Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck! Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up, as long as he believes in the heart of the cards!

programme.title: The Master of Magicians, Part 3
programme.desc: To counter Arkana’s Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: Dark Magician Girl! It’s the battle of the sexes to determine the true master of magicians!

programme.title: Playing With a Parasite, Part 1
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel! Weevil secretly infests Joey’s deck with a parasite that prevents Joey from summoning strong monsters! Without the support of his most powerful beasts, what chance does Joey have against a monster that even Yugi didn’t dare face at Duelist Kingdom: Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth!?

programme.title: Playing With a Parasite, Part 2
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes! Will Weevil’s royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Mime Control, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik’s nefarious Rare Hunters – the silent but deadly Strings! Strings stops all of Yugi’s attacks with Revival Jam, a slippery slime that resurrects whenever it’s destroyed! How can Yugi win if he can’t even put a dent in Strings’s life points?

programme.title: Mime Control, Part 2
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters... the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon! What chance does Yugi’s band of mortal monsters have against an Egyptian God?

programme.title: Mime Control, Part 3
programme.desc: The spell Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand, so Strings’s Slifer the Sky Dragon can grow to infinite attack power! Can Yugi discover Slifer’s one fatal flaw before he’s annihilated by tens of thousands of attack points?

programme.title: Legendary Fisherman, Part 1
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts! If Joey wins, he’ll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye! However, little does Joey realize that he has bigger problems than this duel; the Rare Hunters are closing in on his location…

programme.title: Legendary Fisherman, Part 2
programme.desc: Mako’s oceanic warrior The Legendary Fisherman unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey’s monsters from the depths of the sea! Joey has to put his skills, training and experience to the ultimate test before he’s all washed out!

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 1: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Abductions abound! Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea! To make matters worse, the Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper! The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 2: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba’s tumultuous teamwork! Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they’re sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 3: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it’s too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius, a monstrous menace even more powerful than Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Double Duel, Part 4: Yugi and Kaiba Vs. Lumis and Umbra
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior! However, little does Yugi know that Umbra and Lumis have one final mask to turn Yugi’s monsters against him…

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends! But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they’ve faced… and will be facing in the future!

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s friend vs. friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi! The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes! Can Yugi break Joey out of his spell, or will Joey break Yugi?

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi’s life points, Yugi can’t bring himself to attack his dear friend! Yugi summons Joey’s favorite monster Red-Eyes B. Dragon to try to bring Joey back to his senses. Will seeing his favorite card help Joey break Marik’s spell, or is Yugi’s last ditch effort a lost cause?

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik’s spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle! When Joey draws the card he needs to decimate Yugi’s life points, what chance does Yugi have, especially on his own?

programme.title: Friends Til the End, Part 4
programme.desc: There’s only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea! Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom? However, there may be a special savior who just regained her eyesight…

programme.title: Shadow of a Duel
programme.desc: It’s the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz’s zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City Finals! But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm…

programme.title: Lights, Camera, Duel
programme.desc: It’s the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage! Will Mai succumb to Jean-Claude’s charm, not to mention his cadre of ninja monsters, or will she send him packing back to Tinseltown?

programme.title: Let the Finals Begin!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City Finals begin! The eight finalists will have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky! Yugi and friends finally meet the other finalists, but none of them are who they appear to be…

programme.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s the first duel of the Battle City Finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring thats possessing Bakura! Yugi quickly dispatches Bakura’s grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard…

programme.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura, Part 2
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns! If that’s not bad enough, Bakura’s Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi’s life points every time Yugi attacks! Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi’s trapped!

programme.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi’s Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster! Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals, or will he surrender to save Bakura’s life but lose the only chance to protect the world from Marik’s evil?

programme.title: Rage of the Egyptian Gods
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed! The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released!

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 1
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City Finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion’s strategy that guarantees Joey victory… or is Joey falling into another trap?

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 2
programme.desc: Odion’s Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey’s monsters… and his life points! Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he already too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 3
programme.desc: It’s a feeding frenzy as Odion’s Serket devours Joey’s monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Serket when it ingests Joey’s monsters whenever they’re summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Awakening of Evil, Part 4
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster The Winged Dragon of Ra and targets it to annihilate the rest of Joey’s life points! However, is Odion able to control the ultimate power of an Egyptian God, or will The Winged Dragon of Ra punish all those unworthy of summoning it?

programme.title: Mind Game: Mai Vs. Marik, Part 1
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City Finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it’s a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing life points equals losing your memories! As Marik’s true sinister self comes to the surface, does Mai stand a chance against this malevolent evil?

programme.title: Arena of Lost Souls, Part 1
programme.desc: The #1 American duelist Bandit Keith’s gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave! Joey is all alone in the battle this time!

programme.title: Arena of Lost Souls, Part 2
programme.desc: Joey’s last ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: Trapped in the labyrinth cave, Yugi and friends find an alternate exit, but the door is guarded by Pegasus’s Paradox Brothers. Yugi and Joey will no longer be battling solo; they band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers! The battle for all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus’s castle is on the line!

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey pool their strengths and manage to fend off their opponents’ monsters, but things are about to change as the Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, Summoned Skull and Red-Eyes B. Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of Gate Guardian. Individually, our heroes have no chance, but they will unleash the greatest power of all: teamwork!

programme.title: Depths of Darkness
programme.desc: Shark finally faces off with his archenemy, Quattro! Will Shark get his long awaited revenge, or will he end up sleeping with the fishes?!

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: It’s the cataclysmic conclusion between Shark and Quattro! If Shark doesn’t make a comeback from the depths of defeat, not only is he out of the tournament, but his quest for justice will go unserved!

programme.title: Rockin and Rollin
programme.desc: There’s chaos in the canyon when Yuma duels Nistro to see who will get the last spot in the World Duel Carnival semifinals! Can Yuma dodge defeat in the desert, or is Nistro destined to rock Yumas world?

programme.title: Doctor Visit
programme.desc: When Yuma’s deck goes missing, he and the gang set out to look for it! But when their search leads them to Heartland City, they end up finding much more than they bargained for!

programme.title: Duel of Destiny - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma sets his sights on reeling in Shark in the first battle of the semifinals, but when his foe starts off dueling like a guppy, Yuma questions if he’s being baited! Is it too late for Yuma now to escape a sinister Shark attack?

programme.title: Duel of Destiny - Part 2
programme.desc: This is it! Yuma’s jaw-dropping duel against Shark in the World Duel Carnival semifinals draws to a finish! Can Yuma rise above his razor-sharp rival, or will he be dragged down to the depths of defeat?

programme.title: The Hart of the Matter
programme.desc: The mighty masked duelist Vetrix faces off against the Number Hunter Kite! Unfortunately for Kite, Vetrix springs a shocking surprise that makes dueling all but impossible! Can Kite rise above Vetrix’s heinous handicap, or has this undefeated duelist finally met his match?

programme.title: Change of Hart
programme.desc: The explosive end to the battle between Kite and Vetrix roars to a finish! As the battle climaxes, Yuma sets out to free Kite’s brother Hart from Vetrix’s grasp, while Kite duels knowing full well that Hart’s safety hangs in the balance! Can either of them rise above the risks, or are they both fated to fail?

programme.title: Sphere of Fear - Part 1
programme.desc: It all comes down to this! Yuma squares off against Vetrix in a battle that will determine the first ever World Duel Carnival Champion! Can Yuma figure out a way to outduel Vetrix, or will Vetrix and his devastating deck destroy Yuma’s chance of being a champion?!

programme.title: Sphere of Fear - Part 2
programme.desc: As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix’s shocking secret!

programme.title: Sphere of Fear - Part 3
programme.desc: This is it! The earth-shattering ending of Yuma’s duel against Vetrix! Can Yuma rise above Vetrix’s unrelenting onslaught, or will he meet defeat and lose everything he holds dear – his soul, his Numbers and… Astral?

programme.title: The Countdown Begins
programme.desc: Yuma learns the details of Dr. Faker’s diabolical plan to destroy Astral World! Can Yuma figure out a way to stop Faker, or is the future of Astral World a thing of the past?

programme.title: The Heart of the Cards
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi’s Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: The Gauntlet Is Thrown
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa’s soul as his prize!

programme.title: Journey to the Duelist Kingdom
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister’s eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi’s deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Into The Hornets Nest
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they’ve ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he’s to survive!

programme.title: The Ultimate Great Moth
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil’s first wave of Duel Monsters, Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power every turn! Can Yugi find a way to destroy this winged beast before it destroys him?

programme.title: First Duel
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai’s secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Attack from the Deep
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Everythings Relative
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp’s crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba’s brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother’s company!

programme.title: Duel With a Ghoul
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba. But with his best cards resting at the bottom of the ocean, Yugi must discover a new strategy to survive fake Kaiba’s powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Give up the Ghost
programme.desc: Yugi defeats Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: The Dueling Monkey
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends’ help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own. But as Rex Raptor’s relentless dinos destroys Joey’s best Duel Monsters, will Tristan’s card remind him that with his friends, he is never alone in battle?

programme.title: Trial by Red-Eyes
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Joey must figure out the secret of Yugi’s gift, the Time Wizard card, without Yugi’s help or he’s taking the next boat out of Duelist Kingdom!

programme.title: Evil Spirit of the Ring
programme.desc: Yugi’s classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring’s dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves! Not only must Yugi battle to avoid becoming a permanent part of the card game, but also free Bakura’s soul from the Millennium Ring’s control!

programme.title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel
programme.desc: Pegasus’s hired duelist PaniK cheats Mai of all her Star Chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when PaniK’s Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?

programme.title: Winning Through Intimidation
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes PaniK: “I’ll finish you in three turns.” Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Winning Through Intimidation
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes PaniK: “I’ll finish you in three turns.” Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: The Scars of Defeat
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus! Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba’s Blue-Eyes White Dragon and Joey’s Red-Eyes B. Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Arena of Lost Souls, Part 1
programme.desc: The #1 American duelist Bandit Keith’s gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave! Joey is all alone in the battle this time!

programme.title: Arena of Lost Souls, Part 2
programme.desc: Joey’s last ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: Trapped in the labyrinth cave, Yugi and friends find an alternate exit, but the door is guarded by Pegasus’s Paradox Brothers. Yugi and Joey will no longer be battling solo; they band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers! The battle for all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus’s castle is on the line!

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey pool their strengths and manage to fend off their opponents’ monsters, but things are about to change as the Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, Summoned Skull and Red-Eyes B. Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of Gate Guardian. Individually, our heroes have no chance, but they will unleash the greatest power of all: teamwork!

programme.title: Face Off, Part 1
programme.desc: Using the magic of the Millennium Eye, Pegasus traps Mokuba’s soul inside a card right before Kaiba’s eyes! In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Face Off, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaiba summons Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Face Off, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi’s heart is split in two!

programme.title: Shining Friendship
programme.desc: Having lost his Star Chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra Star Chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Champion Vs. Creator, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba’s soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people’s minds. Can Kaiba defeat an opponent who knows his moves even before he does?

programme.title: Champion Vs. Creator, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus’s Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba’s soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba! Yugi has had enough!

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: T’was the night before the final battle, and many creatures are stirring! Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus’s secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Duel Identity, Part 1
programme.desc: Under Pegasus’s weighty glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish tactical errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpies Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the intense pressure?

programme.title: Duel Identity, Part 2
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: 123 Fusion Destruction
programme.desc: Asuka stays behind to fight Yuri while Sora and the others go on ahead. Yuri uses a different deck and fights Asuka, who tries to reach out a helping hand to Yuri. Thats when Yuri reveals the real reason why he does what he does.

programme.title: Parasite Seeing
programme.desc: Yuya comes across Ruri, who is still under the control of the Doctors parasites. Yuya attempts to fight off Ruri, made harder when Serena joins the fight. Yuto decides to take control and face the two girls.

programme.title: Rise Of The Parasites
programme.desc: Yuya and Yuto are struggling in their battle against Ruri and Serena and their Parasite Queen. The Doctor attempts to take control of Yuya using a parasite as well, but that only awakens the rage inside of Yuya once again.

programme.title: An Evil Ascends
programme.desc: Leo Akaba reveals to Yusho Sakaki how the four dimensions came to be.

programme.title: Revival Zero
programme.desc: Leo continues his story about how Zarc destroyed the original world. Leos daughter Ray used four cards to stop Zarc and split the world into the four current worlds. He then reveals the true nature of Yuya, Yuzu, and the Arc Area Project.

programme.title: What Lurks Beneath
programme.desc: Leo begins his final plan to fuse the dimensions and revive his daughter Ray. Reiji and Yuya team up to take down Leo, with Yuya resolving not to let Zarc be revived. Yusho realizes that even this is part of a larger enemys plan.

programme.title: A Duel Within
programme.desc: Leos plan gets further and further to completion, which causes the evil inside of Yuya to emerge once more. Yusho stops the duel and realizes that Zarcs influence is hovering over everything, including Yuyas other counterparts.

programme.title: Duel Interrupted
programme.desc: Yugo and Yuri being their duel, with Zarcs shared influence forcing them into battle. To stop Zarcs revival, Kaito and Edo join the battle as well to hold back Yuris powerful Fusion Dragon.

programme.title: A Trios Challenge - Part 1
programme.desc: Kite, Shark and Yuma join forces to take down Dr. Faker! Can this trio work together as a team and put an end to Faker’s fury, or will Faker and his deck prove to be too much of a challenge for these three fearless friends?

programme.title: A Trios Challenge - Part 2
programme.desc: With the fate of Astral World hanging in the balance, Yuma, Kite and Shark set their sights on stopping Dr. Faker, but before our three heroes can make their final move, Dr. Faker reveals the shocking reason behind his diabolical plan!

programme.title: A Trios Challenge - Part 3
programme.desc: When a mysterious being from Barian World appears, Yuma, Kite and Shark must work together and battle like never before if they want to save Hart, Astral World… and themselves!

programme.title: Kites Plight - Part 1
programme.desc: The stage is set for the ultimate battle between Yuma and Kite, but just when Yuma’s about to high five the sky, Kite brings him crashing down to earth with a startling revelation!

programme.title: Kites Plight - Part 2
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Kite and Yuma comes to an exciting conclusion that leaves one of our duelists down for the count! Will Yuma’s dream of pulling out a victory become a reality, or is Kite going to turn this dream into a nightmare?

programme.title: Attack of the Barians - Part 1
programme.desc: The Barian invasion begins! Yuma faces a dangerous new enemy who will go to any extreme to gain possession of Yuma’s Numbers in order to destroy Astral and his home!

programme.title: Attack of the Barians - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma’s battle with a dangerous and powerful soldier of Barian World continues as he strives to keep Astral safe! Can Yuma beat this Barian enemy and his new Chaos Monster, or will Yuma end up losing what is most valuable to him… Astral?

programme.title: Hard Knox
programme.desc: When pro duelist Devon Knox teaches a special class, Yuma gets taken to the school of hard knocks and learns a valuable lesson about the Barians he won’t soon forget!

programme.title: Rule Duel
programme.desc: Ray nominates Yuma to run against Caswell for the position of Class Representative, but when the Ray Way takes a turn for the worse, Yuma finds himself facing off against a Student Council President who’s been corrupted by the Barians!

programme.title: The Adventures of Artimus Stanleyus
programme.desc: Shark gets hooked into a battle with the Barians when the President of the Comic Book Appreciation Club challenges him to a duel! Can Shark outdraw the competition, or will his Number and life points be erased?

programme.title: Doom in Bloom
programme.desc: Shark’s sister Rio makes a big splash on her first day at school, but not all the attention she gets is good, especially when she catches the eye of a Barian botanist!

programme.title: Rivals in the Ring
programme.desc: A new Barian threat arrives on the scene looking to take Yuma’s Numbers, but his plan gets tripped up when he falls head over heels for Tori!

programme.title: Keiths Machinations, Part 1
programme.desc: Joey frantically searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it from him. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new, and unexpected, friend!

programme.title: Keiths Machinations, Part 2
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith’s Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith’s battle strategy to metalicize his Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1
programme.desc: With his pride in his strength as a duelist on the line, Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other’s strategies and cards as they struggle to keep their thoughts of past loyalties at the back of their minds.

programme.title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him, the very card he gave Joey as a sign of friendship! However, as the two battle each other valiantly and one comes out the victor, they find confirmation of the strength of their friendship that surpasses any duel.

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba and Mokuba on the line. Meanwhile, Tristan and Bakura infiltrate the castle to find the Kaiba brothers, but at this crucial moment, is Bakura turning back into his evil self again?

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi’s monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi’s soul into a card, just like Kaiba?

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus’s mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus’s Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi crumples in exhaustion under the crippling power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi’s chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi’s Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh? The smallest, weakest creature in the game? Has Yugi given up, or does he have one last strategy to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat? The Shadow Game comes to a close!

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: The Pegasus Saga comes to an end, but a new journey is about to begin! Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi’s mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: The Wrath of Rebecca
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her! She’s here to claim back the card that Grandpa stole from her grandfather many years ago!

programme.title: Ties of Friendship
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it’s not the power of the cards, but the heart that’s in them that counts.

programme.title: Legendary Heroes, Part 1
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of KaibaCorp trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game! Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Legendary Heroes, Part 2
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can Yugi and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Legendary Heroes, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mai lose all their life points! Can Yugi and Kaiba, two former opponents, work together and face the biggest enemy of their lives?

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 Jodha Akbar S4 E13
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 Jodha Akbar S4 E14
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.
